                def get_tax_estimate(location)
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                  #Null for no geocode and 0 for no tax
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
                  tax_service = AvaTax::TaxService.new
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
                  if location[:latitude] && location[:longitude]
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
                    begin
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                      geo_tax_result = tax_service.estimate({latitude: location[:latitude], longitude: location[:longitude]}, 100)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
                      geo_tax_result["Rate"]
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                    rescue => e
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                      Rails.logger.error("Failed to calculate tax - #{e.response}")
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                      nil

                def set_component_params(value)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  # Allows the api to accept params[:page][:component] and updates it to something rails prefers for nested associations
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  page_params = value
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  if value[:components]
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    converted_components = []
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                    value[:components].each do |component|
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                      converted_components << convert_hash_keys(component)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                    page_params[:components_attributes] = converted_components
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                    page_params.delete :components
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                  end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  page_params
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                def underscore_key(k)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  if k == 'componentType' || k == 'componentParentType' || k == 'componentParentId'
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                    k.to_s.underscore.to_sym
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  else
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    k
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                def convert_hash_keys(value)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  case value
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                    when Array
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                      value.map { |v| convert_hash_keys(v) }
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                      # or `value.map(&method(:convert_hash_keys))`
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    when Hash
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                      Hash[value.map { |k, v| [underscore_key(k), convert_hash_keys(v)] }]
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                    else
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                      value
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                  end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72.

                def get_location_result

          1

          1

    28. 
          1

          1

          1
          
                        ::NewRelic::Agent.record_metric('Custom/Errors/GeocodingForPurchase', 1)

          1

          1

                  def multipass

      15.

                def log_upload_url
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  # Based on the steps here:
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  # http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/dev/UploadObjectPreSignedURLRubySDK.html#UploadObjectPreSignedURLRubySDKV1
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
                  if @user_id_from_token
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                    user_prefix = "user/#{@user_id_from_token}"
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                  else
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
                    user_prefix = 'anon'
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                  end
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
                  random_prefix = SecureRandom.hex[0..7]
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
                  object_key = "#{user_prefix}/#{Time.now.to_a.reverse[4..8].join('/')}-#{random_prefix}-#{params[:tag]}"
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
                  Rails.logger.info "Creating log upload url for key [#{object_key}]"
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                  # We use an old version of the AWS SDK
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                  s3 = AWS::S3.new(region:'us-west-2')
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
                  obj = s3.buckets[Rails.configuration.remote_log_bucket].objects[object_key]
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
                  url = obj.url_for(:write, :content_type => 'text/plain', :expires => LOG_UPLOAD_URL_EXPIRATION)
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
                  Rails.logger.info "Created signed url [{#{url.to_s}}]"
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
                  render_api_response 200, {:upload_url => url.to_s}
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                end
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
          
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                private
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                # Why is this code duplicated here?
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                def create_new_user(user, optout, source)
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                  if user.save
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
                    aa = ActorAddress.create_for_user @user, client_metadata: "create"
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          1
          
                    subscribe_and_track user, optout, source
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
                    render json: {status: 200, message: 'Success', token: aa.current_token.to_jwt}, status: 200
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                  else
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          1
          
                    logger.warn "create_new_user errors: #{user.errors.inspect}"
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                    render json: {status: 400, message: 'Bad Request: An error occured when trying to create this user.'}, status: 400
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                  end
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104.

      105.

            def track_event(trackable, action = params[:action])
        
      151. 
      
        
    151.

            def track_receiver_event(trackable, action = params[:action])
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              logger.info(trackable.receiver.inspect)
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
              if trackable.receiver
        
      159. 
      
        
    159.

      235.

          1

            def render_404(exception = nil)
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
              @not_found_path = exception.message if exception
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          1
          
              logger.info('---------- render_404')
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          1
          
              logger.info(exception.inspect) if exception
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          1
          
                format.html { render template: 'errors/not_found', layout: 'layouts/application', status: 404 }
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          2
          
                format.all { render nothing: true, status: 404 }
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
              end
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
            end
        
      256.

          class BaseApplicationController < ActionController::Base

      4.

            def record_uuid_in_new_relic
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
              ::NewRelic::Agent.add_custom_parameters({ request_id: request.uuid()})
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            end
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
            def cors_set_access_control_headers
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              # When XHR is made withCredentials=true, the browser requires that the allowed
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              # origin not be set to * so we instead echo back the origin header to
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              # achieve effectively the same behaviour.  This is restricted to requests
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              # coming from "similar" origins (same domain, possibly different protocol)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
              if request.headers['origin']
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                begin
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                  origin_hostname = URI(request.headers['origin']).host
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                rescue URI::InvalidURIError
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info "[cors] Invalid origin #{request.headers['origin']} setting no CORS headers"
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  return
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                headers['Access-Control-Allow-Origin'] = request.headers['origin']
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
                headers['Access-Control-Allow-Methods'] = 'POST, GET, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS'
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                headers['Access-Control-Allow-Headers'] = '*, X-Requested-With, X-Prototype-Version, X-CSRF-Token, Content-Type, Authorization'
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                headers['Access-Control-Max-Age'] = "1728000"
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                # host header is not a URI as it doesn't include protocol but it does include a port
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                host_hostname = request.headers['host'].split(':')[0]
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                # chefsteps.dev is required for testing Facebook auth locally
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                similar_origin = (origin_hostname == host_hostname || origin_hostname == 'chefsteps.dev')
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                if similar_origin
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1

      34. 
      
        
    34.

      35.

            def catch_and_retry(retry_count)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
              begin
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                yield
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
              rescue => error
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                retry_count -= 1
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                if retry_count > 0
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                  Rails.logger.error("Got error #{error} Retrying #{retry_count} more times")
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                  retry
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                else
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.error("Received Error #{error}")
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
            def cache_for_production(cache_name, expiration)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
              result = nil
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
              if Rails.env.production?
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
                result = Rails.cache.fetch(cache_name, expires_in: expiration) do
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  yield
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              else
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                result = yield
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
              return result
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
            end

            def subscribe_and_track(user, optout, signup_method)

          1

      97. 
      
        
    97.

            def email_list_signup(user, source='unknown', listname=Rails.configuration.mailchimp[:list_id])
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
              begin
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1

      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1

      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                  id: listname,
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  email: {email: user.email},
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                  merge_vars: {NAME: user.name, SOURCE: source},
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  double_optin: false,
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  send_welcome: false
        
      127. 
      
        
    127.

      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
          
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
              rescue Exception => e
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
                case Rails.env
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                when "production", "staging", "staging2"
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
                  logger.warn("[mailchimp] error: #{e.message}")
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                  unless e.message.include?("already subscribed to list")
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                    logger.error("[mailchimp] Failed to add user to mailchimp")
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                  end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                else
        
      137.

      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
              end
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
            end

            def mixpanel_anonymous_id
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
              begin
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                JSON.parse(cookies["mp_#{mixpanel.instance_variable_get('@token')}_mixpanel"])['distinct_id']
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
                id = request.session_options[:id]
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
                cookies["mp_#{mixpanel.instance_variable_get('@token')}_mixpanel"] = {distinct_id: id}.to_json
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
                id
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
            end

            def info

            def load_commentable
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
              resource, id = request.path.split('/')[1, 2]
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
              @commentable = resource.singularize.classify.constantize.find(id.to_i)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
              puts '---------------'
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
              puts resource
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
            end
        
      45.

      46.

          1
          
            def find_commentable(commentsId)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              pos = commentsId.rindex('_')
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              if pos
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                class_name = commentsId[0...pos]
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                id = commentsId[pos+1..-1]
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                class_name.gsub('_', ' ').titleize.gsub(' ','').singularize.classify.constantize.find(id)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
            def determine_url(commentable)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              if commentable.class.to_s == 'PollItem'
        
      57. 
      
        
    57.

      58.

                polymorphic_url(commentable)
        
      60.

    47.

            def merge
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              authorize! :update, Equipment
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                format.json do
        
      81. 
      
        
    81.

      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                    @result_equipment = Equipment.find(params[:id])
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    @equipment = Equipment.find(params[:merge].split(','))
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                    puts "Merging " + @equipment.inspect
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                    puts "Into " + @result_equipment.inspect
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                    @result_equipment.merge(@equipment)
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                    head :no_content
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotUnique => e
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                    messages = [] || @equipment.errors.full_messages
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                    messages.push("You cannot merge equipment that is used on the same activity")
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                    render json: { errors: messages}, status: 422
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                  rescue Exception => e
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                    messages = [] || @equipment.errors.full_messages
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                    messages.push(e.message)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                    # messages.push(e.backtrace) # For debuggin only
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                    render json: { errors: messages}, status: 422
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                  end
        
      98.

            def index
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              @show_app_add = true
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              @classes = Assembly.pubbed_courses.order('created_at desc').limit(3).to_a
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
              prereg_assembly_classes = Assembly.prereg_courses.order('created_at desc').limit(1)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              pubbed_assembly_classes = Assembly.pubbed_courses.order('created_at desc').limit(1)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              @assembly_classes = prereg_assembly_classes | pubbed_assembly_classes
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              @projects = Assembly.projects.published.order('created_at desc')
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              @latest = Activity.published.chefsteps_generated.include_in_feeds.order('published_at desc').first(6)

            def welcome
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
              if params[:referrer_id] && params[:referred_from] && mixpanel_anonymous_id.present?
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                referrer = User.find(params[:referrer_id])
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                session[:referrer_id] = referrer.id
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                session[:referred_from] = params[:referred_from]
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                set_referrer_in_mixpanel("#{session[:referred_from]} invitee visited")
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
              end
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
              index
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              render("home/index")
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              # redirect_to root_path
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
            end
        
      159.

            def kiosk
        
      161.

              @hide_nav = true
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
            end
        
      163.

            def embeddable_signup
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
              @hide_nav = true
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
              render
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
            end

            def terms

            def facebook_optout
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              if request.post?
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                GenericMailer.recipient_email('info@chefsteps.com', 'Facebook Audience Opt-Out', "Please opt out #{params[:email]} from our facebook custom audience").deliver
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                redirect_to root_path
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
              end
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
            end
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
          end
        
      182.

    app/controllers/ingredients_controller.rb

    21.01 % covered

    119 relevant lines. 25 lines covered and 94 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          class IngredientsController < ApplicationController
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            respond_to :json
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
            has_scope :include_sub_activities, default: "false" do |controller, scope, value|
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              value == "false" ? scope.no_sub_activities : scope
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            end
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
            has_scope :search_title do |controller, scope, value|
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              controller.params[:exact_match] == "true" ? scope.exact_search(value) : scope.search_title(value)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            end
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
            has_scope :image do |controller, scope, value|
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              case value
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              when "with_image"
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                value = scope.with_image
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              when "no_image"
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                value = scope.no_image
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              else
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                value = scope
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
            has_scope :purchaseable do |controller, scope, value|

              value == "with_purchase_link" ? scope.with_purchase_link : scope.no_purchase_link
        
      25.

      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1

              case value

      39.

      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
            has_scope :sort do |controller, scope, value|
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              case value
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                when "name"
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  scope.order('title ASC')
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                when "recently_added"
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                  scope.order('created_at DESC')
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                when "recently_edited"
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  scope.order('updated_at DESC')
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                when "most_edited"
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  scope.select("DISTINCT count(DISTINCT(events.user_id)), ingredients.*").joins(:events).where(events: {action: 'edit'}).group('ingredients.id').order("count(DISTINCT(events.user_id)) DESC")
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                when "most_used"
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  scope.select("DISTINCT count(DISTINCT(activity_ingredients.id)), ingredients.*").joins(:activity_ingredients).group('ingredients.id').order("count(DISTINCT(activity_ingredients.id)) DESC")
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                else
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  # Relevance is the default sort for pg_search so don't need to do anything
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                  scope
        
      55. 
      
        
    55.

            def index
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                format.json do
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                  sort_string = (params[:sort] || "title") + " " + (params[:dir] || "ASC").upcase
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                  if params[:include_sub_activities] == "true"
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                    # I couldn't get this to combine with the other scopes, but in the situation where we use this we don't actually need anything else so
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                    # going with naked SQL.
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                    result = Ingredient.find_by_sql(["SELECT * FROM ingredients i JOIN activities a ON i.sub_activity_id = a.id WHERE i.title iLIKE ? AND source_activity_id IS NULL AND a.title <> '' ORDER BY a.title ASC LIMIT ? OFFSET ?", "%#{params[:search_title]}%", params[:limit] || 20, params[:offset] || 0])
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  else
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                    result = apply_scopes(Ingredient).where("title <>''").order(sort_string).offset(params[:offset]).limit(params[:limit])
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                  end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                  if params[:detailed] == "true"
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                    result = result.includes(:activities, steps: [:activity])
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                    render :json => result.as_json(include: {activities: {only: [:id, :title]}, steps: {only: :id, include: {activity: {only: [:id, :title]}}}})
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                  else
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                    render :json => result.to_json
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                  end
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                end
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            end
        
      84.

            def update
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              authorize! :update, Ingredient
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                format.json do
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                  @ingredient = Ingredient.find(params[:id])
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                    if @ingredient.sub_activity_id && params[:ingredient][:title] != @ingredient.title
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                      raise "Can't change name of ingredient that is a recipe"
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                    else
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                      @ingredient.store_revision do
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                        @ingredient.update_attributes(params[:ingredient])
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                        # Why on earth are tags and steps not root wrapped but equipment and ingredients are?
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                        # I'm not sure where this happens, but maybe using the angular restful resources plugin would help.
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                        tags = params.delete(:tags)
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                        @ingredient.tag_list = tags.map { |t| t[:name]} if tags
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                        @ingredient.save!
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                        track_event(@ingredient, 'edit')
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                      end
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                      head :no_content
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                    end
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  rescue Exception => e
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                    messages = [] || @ingredient.errors.full_messages
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                    messages.push(e.message)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                    render json: { errors: messages}, status: 422
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                  end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
              end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
            end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              authorize! :create, Ingredient
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                format.json do
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                    @ingredient = Ingredient.new(params[:ingredient])
        
      141. 
      
        
    141.

      142.

      143. 
      
        
    143.

      144.

            def destroy
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage, Ingredient
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
              @ingredient = Ingredient.find(params[:id])
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                format.json do
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                    if @ingredient.sub_activity_id
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                      raise "Can't delete ingredient that is a recipe"
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                    elsif (@ingredient.activities.count) > 0 || (@ingredient.steps.count > 0)
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                      raise "Can't delete an ingredient that is in use"
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                    else
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                      @ingredient.destroy
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                      head :no_content
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                    end
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                  rescue Exception => e
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                    messages = [] || @ingredient.errors.full_messages
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                    messages.push(e.message)
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                    puts $@
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                    render json: { errors: messages}, status: 422
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                  end
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                end
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              end
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
            end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1

          1

            def merge
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage, Ingredient
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
              puts "Merging " + @ingredients.inspect
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
              puts "Into " + @result_ingredient.inspect
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                format.json do
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                    @result_ingredient = Ingredient.find(params[:id])
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                    @ingredients = Ingredient.find(params[:merge].split(','))
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                    @result_ingredient.merge(@ingredients)
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                    head :no_content
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                  rescue Exception => e
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                    messages = [] || @ingredient.errors.full_messages
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                    messages.push(e.message)
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                    render json: { errors: messages}, status: 422
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                  end
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
              end
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
            end
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
              # TODO: duplicate code in activities_controller.rb
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
            def get_all_tags
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              result = ActsAsTaggableOn::Tag.where('name iLIKE ?', '%' + (params[:q] || '') + '%').all
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                format.json {
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                  render :json => result.to_json()
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                }
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
              end
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
            end
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          end

    app/controllers/likes_controller.rb

          class LikesController < ApplicationController

            def create
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              if params[:likeable_type] && params[:likeable_id]
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                @like = Like.new(likeable_type: params[:likeable_type], likeable_id: params[:likeable_id])
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                @like.user_id = current_user.id
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                if @like.save
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                  track_event @like
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                  track_receiver_event @like
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                  reindex(params[:likeable_type], params[:likeable_id])
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                end
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              end
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              render nothing: true
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              # redirect_to request.referrer
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
            end
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
            def unlike
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              if params[:likeable_type] && params[:likeable_id]
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                @like = Like.where(likeable_type: params[:likeable_type], likeable_id: params[:likeable_id], user_id: current_user.id).first.destroy
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                reindex(params[:likeable_type], params[:likeable_id])
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              render nothing: true
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
            end
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
            def by_user
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
              if ! current_user
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                render json: []
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                return
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
              resource = params[:likeable_type]
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
              id = params[:likeable_id]
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
              if ['Activity', 'Upload'].include?(resource)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                @likeable = resource.singularize.classify.constantize.find(id)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
                @likes = current_user.likes_object?(@likeable) ? [true] : []
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                render :json => @likes.to_json
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
            end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
            private
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
            def reindex(likeable_type, likeable_id)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              # If the likeable object is indexed by Algolia, trigger reindex so the count is updated
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              klazz = likeable_type.constantize
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              if klazz.method_defined?(:index!)

    app/controllers/tokens_controller.rb

    33.33 % covered

    1. 
          1
          
          class TokensController < ApplicationController
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            def verify
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              @user = User.where(id: params[:id]).where(authentication_token: params[:auth_token])
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              if @user.any?
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
                render nothing: true, status: 200
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              else
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                render nothing: true, status: 401
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              end
        
      9. 
      
        
    9.

            def sign_in_and_redirect(resource_or_scope, resource=nil)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
              scope = Devise::Mapping.find_scope!(resource_or_scope)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
              resource ||= resource_or_scope
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
              if resource.deleted_at.blank?
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
                sign_in(scope, resource) unless warden.user(scope) == resource
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                current_user.ensure_authentication_token!  #make sure the user has a token generated
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
                remember_and_track
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                return render status: 200, json: {success: true, info: "Logged in", user: current_user.to_json(methods: :authentication_token, include: [:enrollments])}
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              else
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info "User has been deleted"
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                return render status: 200, json: {success: true, info: "Your account has been deleted"}
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
            end
        
      70.

      71.

            def link_to_publishable(model, text=false)

    52. 
          
          
              model_name = model.class.to_s.underscore
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              if model.published?
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                link_to text || 'public link', send("#{model_name}_path", model), target: '_blank'
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              else
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                link_to text || 'private link', send("#{model_name}_path", model, token: PrivateToken.token), target: '_blank'
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
            end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          end
        
      60.

            def filepicker_arbitrary_image(fpfile, width, fit='max')
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
              if ! fpfile
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                ""
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
              elsif ! fpfile.start_with?('{')
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                # Legacy naked S3 image id. Still used for a few images that don't
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                # have UI to set.
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                if /placehold/.match(fpfile)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                  fpfile
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                else
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  s3_image_url(fpfile)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                end
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              else
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                url = ActiveSupport::JSON.decode(fpfile)["url"]
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                url = url + "/convert?fit=#{fit}&w=#{width}&h=#{(width * 9.0 / 16.0).floor}&quality=90&cache=true"
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                # Route through CDN
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1

            def conditional_cache(name = {}, options = nil, &block)
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              if options.delete(:cache_unless)
        
      114. 
      
        
    114.

      115.

              else
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                cache(name, options, &block)

              end
        
      118.

            def fancy_checkbox_tag(name, value = '1', checked = false, options = {}, &block)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
              label_for = options[:id] || name
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              content_tag :div, data: {behavior: 'checkbox'} do
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                content = check_box_tag name, value, checked, options
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                content += label_tag label_for, &block
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
              end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
            end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136.

            def fancy_radio_button_tag(name, value, checked = false, options = {}, &block)
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
              label_for = options[:id] || "#{name}_#{value}"
        
      138. 
      
        
    138.

      139. 
      
        
    139.

    140.

      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
              end

            end

            def apply_shortcode(orig, shortcode, contents)
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
              case shortcode
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                when 'c'
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                  "<span class='temperature'>#{(contents.to_f * 1.8).round + 32}&nbsp;&deg;F / #{contents}&nbsp;&deg;C</span>"
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                when 'f'
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                  "<span class='temperature'>#{contents}&nbsp;&deg;F / #{((contents.to_f - 32) / 1.8).round}&nbsp;&deg;C</span>"
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                when 'cm'
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                  "<a class='length-group'><span class='length' data-orig-value='#{contents}'>#{contents} cm</span></a>"
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                when 'mm'
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                  "<a class='length-group'><span class='length' data-orig-value='#{contents.to_f / 10.0}'>#{contents} mm</span></a>"
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                when 'g'
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                  "<span class='text-quantity-group'><span class='quantity-group qtyfade'><span class='lbs-qty'></span> <span class='lbs-label'></span> <span class='main-qty'>#{contents}</span></span> <span class='unit qtyfade'>g</span></span>"
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                when 'ea'
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                  "<span class='text-quantity-group'><span class='quantity-group qtyfade'><span class='lbs-qty'></span> <span class='lbs-label'></span> <span class='main-qty'>#{contents}</span></span> <span class='unit qtyfade alwayshidden'>ea</span></span>"
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
          
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                when 'amzn'
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                  asin, anchor_text = contents.split(/\s/, 2)
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                  link_to anchor_text, "http://www.amazon.com/dp/#{asin}/?tag=delvkitc-20", target: "_blank"
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                else
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
                  orig
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
              end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
            end
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
          
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
            def apply_shortcodes(text)
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
              (text || '').gsub(/\[(\w+)\s+([^\]]*)\]/) do |orig|
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1
          
                shortcode = $1
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          1
          
                contents = $2
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
                apply_shortcode(orig, shortcode, contents).html_safe
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              end
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
            end
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
            def where_user_left_off_in_course(course, user, btn_class = nil)
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
              # TODO needs refactoring when we move over old courses
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              if course.class.to_s == 'Assembly'
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                last_viewed_activity = user.last_viewed_activity_in_assembly(course)
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                if last_viewed_activity
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                  link_to "Continue Class #{content_tag :i, nil, class: 'icon-chevron-right'}".html_safe, class_activity_path(course, last_viewed_activity), class: btn_class
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                else
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                  link_to "Start the Class #{content_tag :i, nil, class: 'icon-chevron-right'}".html_safe, landing_class_path(course), class: btn_class
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
              else
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
                last_viewed_activity = user.last_viewed_activity_in_course(course)
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
                if last_viewed_activity
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                  link_to "Continue Class #{content_tag :i, nil, class: 'icon-chevron-right'}".html_safe, [course, last_viewed_activity], class: btn_class
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                else
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                  first_activity = course.first_published_activity
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                  link_to "Start the Class #{content_tag :i, nil, class: 'icon-chevron-right'}".html_safe, [course, first_activity], class: btn_class
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                end
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
              end
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
            end
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
          
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
            def link_to_web_email(email)
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
              email_service = /\@(.*)/.match(email).to_s
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
              case email_service
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
              when '@gmail.com'
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                email_service_name = 'Gmail'
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                email_service_url = 'http://www.gmail.com'
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
              when '@hotmail.com'
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                email_service_name = 'Hotmail'
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                email_service_url = 'http://www.hotmail.com'
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
              when '@yahoo.com'
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                email_service_name = 'Yahoo Mail'
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                email_service_url = 'http://mail.yahoo.com'
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
              else
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                email_service_name = nil
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                email_service_url = nil
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
              end
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
              if email_service_name && email_service_url
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
                link_to "Go to #{email_service_name}", email_service_url, class: 'btn btn-primary btn-large', target: '_blank'
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
              else
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
                nil
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
              end
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
            end
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
          
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          1
          
            def buy_now(variant_id, price, mixpanel_track = nil, backordered = false)
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
              message = backordered ? 'Backordered' : 'Buy Now'
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
              link_to "#{message} for $#{price}", 'http://store.chefsteps.com/cart/add', onclick: "#{mixpanel_track} var f = document.createElement('form'); f.style.display = 'none'; this.parentNode.appendChild(f); f.method = 'POST'; f.action = this.href; var v = document.createElement('input'); v.setAttribute('type', 'hidden'); v.setAttribute('name', 'id'); v.setAttribute('value', '#{variant_id}'); f.appendChild(v); var r = document.createElement('input'); r.setAttribute('type', 'hidden'); r.setAttribute('name', 'return_to'); r.setAttribute('value', 'http://store.chefsteps.com/checkout'); f.appendChild(r); f.submit(); return false;", class: 'btn btn-primary btn-large btn-block'

            def link_to_add_fields(name, f, association)
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
              new_object = f.object.send(association).klass.new

          end
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
          class GenericReceiptMailer < BaseMandrillMailer
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
            def format_address(shipping)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              addr = shipping[:address]
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              <<-ADDRESS
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              #{shipping[:name]}
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              <br>#{addr[:line1]}#{"<br>" + addr[:line2] if addr[:line2]}
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              <br>#{addr[:city]}, #{addr[:state]} #{addr[:postal_code]}
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              ADDRESS
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
            end
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
            def prepare(order, stripe_charge)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              subject = "ChefSteps Receipt"
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              user = order.user
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              lines = order.stripe_items
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              total = stripe_charge.amount
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              subtotal = total
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              tax = 0
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              tax_line = stripe_charge.items.find { |i| i.type == "tax" }
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              if tax_line
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                tax = tax_line.amount
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                subtotal = subtotal - tax
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              # If Joule and including premium for free, document that
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              if lines.count == 1 && lines[0][:parent] == 'cs10001'
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                lines << {
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                  amount: 0,
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                  currency: 'usd',
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                  description: 'ChefSteps Premium',
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  parent: 'cs10002',
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  quantity: 1,
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  type: 'sku'
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                }
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              card = Stripe::Charge.retrieve(stripe_charge.charge).card
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              merge_vars = {
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                "ITEM1_NAME" => lines[0][:description],
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                "ITEM1_PRICE" => format_currency(lines[0][:amount]),
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                "ITEM2_NAME" => lines.count > 1 ? lines[1][:description] : "",
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                "ITEM2_PRICE" => lines.count > 1 ? format_currency(lines[1][:amount]) : "",
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                "SUBTOTAL" => format_currency(subtotal),
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                "TAX" => format_currency(tax),
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                "TOTAL" => format_currency(total),
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                "PURCHASE_DATE" => DateTime.now.strftime('%B %d, %Y'),
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                "CARD_AND_LAST4" => card.brand + " " + card.last4,
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                "ORDER_ID" => stripe_charge.id,
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                "SHIPPING_ADDRESS" => format_address(stripe_charge.shipping)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              }
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              body = mandrill_template("generic-receipt", merge_vars)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              send_mail(user.email, subject, body)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
            end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          end
        
      65.
