    app/middleware/fresh_steps_proxy.rb

    30.88 % covered

    68 relevant lines. 21 lines covered and 47 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          require "rack-proxy"
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          class FreshStepsProxy < Rack::Proxy
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            # For awhile I had /browser-sync in this list, which was nice
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            # because it got rid of rails errors and also made livereloading
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            # work when proxying, but it also made regular page loads incredibly slow, I think because
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            # browser-sync was pinging multiple times per second. Although without the proxy, rails returns 406 so
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
            # it is still doing work. Curious.
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            PREFIX = %w(/gallery /classes/espresso /logout /fs_pages /fs_activities /gift /admin/components /tpq /about /press /press-faq /joule /joule-overview /recommended /market)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            EXACT = %w(/ /classes /sous-vide /grilling /indoor-barbecue /thanksgiving /holiday /premium /password-reset /chefsteps-debuts-joule /jobs /gifting /sso /sign-up /steak-by-joule /gifs /404)
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            EXCLUDE = %w(/joule/warranty)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
            SUFFIX = %w(/fork /notify_start_edit /notify_end_edit /as_json /the-egg-calculator /new)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
            def initialize(app)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              @app = app
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              @backend_host = Rails.application.config.shared_config[:freshsteps_endpoint] || ENV["FRESHSTEPS_ENDPOINT"]
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              @backend_protocol = "http"
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              backend_uri = "#{@backend_protocol}://#{@backend_host}"
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info("Initializing FreshStepsProxy with backend: #{backend_uri}")
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              super({backend: backend_uri})
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
            def call(env)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
              if should_proxy?(env)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                req = Rack::Request.new(env)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                cookie_value = AnalyticsParametizer.cookie_value(req.params, req.cookies, req.referrer)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                Rails.logger.info("FreshStepsProxy request for path [#{env['REQUEST_URI']}]")
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                env["HTTP_HOST"] = @backend_host
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                env["REQUEST_PATH"] = env["REQUEST_URI"] = env["PATH_INFO"] = "/index.html"
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                status, headers, body = perform_request(env)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                # The rack proxy mutates the http headers in a way which causes the rack
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                # cache layer to crash.  This un-does the mutation.
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                if headers.has_key?('cache-control') && headers['cache-control'].kind_of?(Array)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                  headers['cache-control'] = headers['cache-control'][0]
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                utm_cookie = {
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  :value => cookie_value,
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  :domain => Rails.application.config.cookie_domain
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                }
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                Rack::Utils.set_cookie_header!(headers, 'utm', utm_cookie)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                [status, headers, body]
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              else
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                @app.call(env)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
            end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
            def should_proxy?(env)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
              request = Rack::Request.new(env)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              # Don't proxy explicit requests for .json, those must be API type calls (like old index_as_json.json for mobile app)
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
              return false if request.path.end_with?('.json')
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
              prefix_match = PREFIX.include?(request.path) || PREFIX.any?{|prefix| request.path.starts_with?(prefix + "/")}
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
              exact_match = EXACT.include?(request.path)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
              exclude_match = EXCLUDE.include?(request.path)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              # The logic below will only proxy GET requests with path /activities/:id
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
              activity_show_match = request.get? &&
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                                    request.path.starts_with?('/activities') &&
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                                    request.params['start_in_edit'].blank? &&
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                                    !SUFFIX.any?{|suffix| request.path.end_with?(suffix)}
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
              !exclude_match && (prefix_match || exact_match || activity_show_match)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
            end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          end
        
      69.

    app/middleware/preauth_enforcer.rb

    27.87 % covered

    61 relevant lines. 17 lines covered and 44 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          class PreauthEnforcer
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
            def initialize(app, exceptions = [], restrictions = [])
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              @app = app
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              @exceptions = exceptions
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              @restrictions = restrictions
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info("[preauth] Initializing with exceptions #{@exceptions}")
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            end
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            def call(env)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
              passthrough = passthrough?(env)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
              preauthed = preauthed?(env)
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
              Rails.logger.info("[preauth] Passthrough: #{passthrough} Preauthed: #{preauthed}")
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
              if passthrough || preauthed
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                @app.call(env)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              else
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                [401, {}, ["Unauthorized - preauthorization required"]]
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              end
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
            end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
            def passthrough?(env)
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
              path = env['REQUEST_PATH']
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              # Restrictions are always applied first
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
              @restrictions.each do |restriction|
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                if restriction.match(path)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("[preauth] Request for path [#{path}] matches restriction #{restriction}")
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                  return false
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
              @exceptions.each do |exception|
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                if exception.match(path)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  Rails.logger.info("[preauth] Request for path [#{path}] matches exception #{exception}")
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  return true
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              return false
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
            end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
            def preauthed?(env)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
              request = ActionDispatch::Request.new(env)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
              raw_token = request.cookie_jar[:cs_preauth]
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
              if raw_token.nil?
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                Rails.logger.info "[preauth] No cs_preauth token present"
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                return false
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              token = AuthToken.from_string(raw_token)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              aa = ActorAddress.find_for_token(token)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              if aa.nil?
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info "[preauth] No actor address found for token #{raw_token}"
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                return false
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              unless aa.actor.admin
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info "[preauth] Actor #{aa.inspect} is not admin, rejecting."
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                return false
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info "[preauth] Accepting preauth token from user #{aa.actor.id}"
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              return true
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
            end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          end
        
      62.

    app/middleware/robots_txt.rb

    1. 
          
          
          class RobotsTxt
        
      2.

            def self.call(env)
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              # start building a new response
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
              response = Rack::Response.new
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              # set content type to plain txt file
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
              response['Content-Type'] = 'text/plain'
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              # cache the response for one year, so that further requests won't hit
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              # the application
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
              response['Cache-Control'] = 'public, max-age=31557600' # cache for 1 year
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              # if we're not in production env, set the content to disallow all robots
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
              unless Rails.env.production?
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                # disallow access to the whole site (/) for all agents (*)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                response.write "User-agent: *\nDisallow: /"
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              end
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
              response.finish
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
            end

    20. 
          
          
          end

            before_save :check_published
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
            before_save :strip_title
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
            def strip_title
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
              self.title = self.title.strip if self.title?
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
              true
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
            end
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
            after_commit :create_or_update_as_ingredient, :if => :persisted?
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
            def create_or_update_as_ingredient
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
              if self.id then
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                i = Ingredient.find_or_create_by_sub_activity_id(self.id)
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          1
          
                i.update_attribute(:title, self.title)
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
              end
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
            end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
          
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
            before_destroy :destroy_as_ingredient
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
            def destroy_as_ingredient
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
              Ingredient.find_by_sub_activity_id(self.id).destroy
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
            end
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          1
          
            def self.difficulty_enum
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
              ['easy', 'intermediate', 'advanced']
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
            end
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
          
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
            def optional_equipment
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
              # Using the optional/required scopes hits the database and messes up the
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
              # versions view (which depends on plucking everything from the in-memory temp model)
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
              equipment.select { |x| x.optional }
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
            end
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
          
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          1
          
            def required_equipment
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
              # See note in optional_equipment
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
              equipment.select { |x| ! x.optional }
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
            end
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
          
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          1
          
            def next
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
              activities = Activity.ordered.published.all
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
              i = activities.index(self)
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
              return nil if i.nil?
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          1
          
              activities[i+1]
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
            end
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
          
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
            def prev
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
              activities = Activity.ordered.published.all
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
              i = activities.index(self)
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
              return nil if i.nil? || i == 0
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
              activities[i-1]
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
            end
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
          
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
            def has_description?
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          1
          
              description.present?
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          1
          
            end
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
          
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
            def meta_description
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
              return short_description if short_description.present?
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          2
          
              return description if description.present?
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          1
          
              return title if title.present?
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
              ""
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
            end
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
          
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
            def is_recipe?
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
              # ingredients.count > 0
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
              activity_type.include?('Recipe')
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
            end
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
          
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
            def step_by_step?
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
              steps.count > 0
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
            end
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
          
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
            def published_variations
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          1
          
              Activity.published.where(source_activity_id: self.id)
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
            end
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
            def update_equipment(equipment_attrs)
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
              if equipment_attrs
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
                reject_invalid_equipment(equipment_attrs)
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
                update_and_create_equipment(equipment_attrs)
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
                delete_old_equipment(equipment_attrs)
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
              end
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          
          
              self
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
            end
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
          
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
            def update_equipment_json(equipment_attrs)
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
              # Easiest just to be rid of all of the old join records, we'll make them from scratch
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          1
          
              equipment.destroy_all()
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          1
          
              equipment.reload()
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          2
          
              if equipment_attrs
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
                equipment_attrs.each_with_index do |e, idx|
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          1
          
                  title = e[:equipment][:title]
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
                  unless title.nil? || title.blank?
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          1
          
                    title.strip!
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
                    equipment_item = Equipment.where(id: e[:equipment][:id]).first_or_create(title: title)
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          1
          
                    activity_equipment = ActivityEquipment.create!({
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
                        activity_id: self.id,
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
                        equipment_id: equipment_item.id,
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
                        optional: e[:optional] || false,
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
                        equipment_order: idx
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
                    })
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
                   end
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
                end
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
              end
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          1
          
              self
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          
          
            end
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
          
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
            def update_ingredients_json(ingredients_attrs)
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
              # Easiest just to be rid of all of the old join records, we'll make them from scratch
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          1
          
              ingredients.destroy_all()
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          1
          
              ingredients.reload()
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
              if ingredients_attrs
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          1
          
                ingredients_attrs.each_with_index do |i, idx|
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
                  title = i[:ingredient][:title]
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
                  unless title.nil? || title.blank?
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          1
          
                    title.strip!
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
          
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          2
          
                    the_ingredient = Ingredient.find_or_create_by_id_or_subactivity_or_ingredient_title(i[:ingredient][:id], title)
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
          
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          1
          
                    ActivityIngredient.create!({
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
                        activity_id: self.id,
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          
          
                        ingredient_id: the_ingredient.id,
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
                        note: i[:note],
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          
          
                        display_quantity: i[:display_quantity],
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          
          
                        unit: i[:unit],
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          1
          
                        ingredient_order: idx
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
                    })
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
          
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
                  end
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          
          
                end
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          
          
              end
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          1
          
              self
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          
          
            end
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
          
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          1
          
            def reject_invalid_steps(step_attrs)
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          1
          
              step_attrs.select! do |step_attr|
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          1
          
                [:directions, :image_id, :youtube_id, :vimeo_id, :title].any? do |test|
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          1
          
                  step_attr[test].present?
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          
          
                end
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          
          
              end
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          
          
            end
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          
          
          
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
            def update_steps(step_attrs)
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          2
          
              if step_attrs
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          1
          
                reject_invalid_steps(step_attrs)
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          1
          
                update_and_create_steps(step_attrs)
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          1
          
                delete_old_steps(step_attrs)
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          1
          
              end
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          1
          
              self
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          
          
            end
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          
          
          
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          1
          
          
        
      339. 
      
        
    339.

      343. 
      
        
    343.

      344.

      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
              self
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          1
          
            end
        
      347.

            def has_ingredients?

              !ingredients.empty?
        
      350.

            end
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          
          
          
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          
          
            def ordered_steps

          1

      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          
          
          
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          
          
            def self.new_content
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          1
          
              published.with_video.order('updated_at DESC').reject{|a| a.youtube_id == Video.featured_id || a.youtube_id.length < 3}.sample(5)
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          
          
            end
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          
          
          
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          
          
            def step_images
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          2
          
              steps.map(&:image_id).reject(&:blank?)
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          
          
            end
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          
          
          
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          
          
            def self.text_search(query)
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          1
          
              if query.present?
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          
          
                search(query)
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          
          
              else
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          
          
                published
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          1
          
              end
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          
          
            end
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          
          
          
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          
          
            def attached_classes_weighted(weight = 10)
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          1
          
              attached_classes = []
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          1
          
              attached_classes << self.class
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          1
          
              attached_classes << 'Recipe' if is_recipe?
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          2
          
              attached_classes*weight
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          
          
            end
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          
          
          
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          
          
            def tags_weighted(weight = 5)
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          1
          
              tag_list.join(',')*weight
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          
          
            end
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          
          
          
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          
          
            def ingredients_weighted(weight = 2)
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          1
          
              ingredients.map(&:ingredient).map(&:title).join(',')*weight
        
      385. 
      
        
    385. 
          
          
            end
        
      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          1
          
          
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          
          
            def steps_weighted(weight = 1)
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          1
          
              steps.map{|a|[a.title, a.directions]}.flatten.join(',')*weight
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          
          
            end
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          
          
          
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          
          
            def true_ingredient_ids
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          
          
              ingredients.map(&:ingredient_id)
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          
          
            end
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          
          
          
        
      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          
          
            def compare(activity)
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          
          
              ingredients_a = true_ingredient_ids
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          
          
              ingredients_b = activity.true_ingredient_ids
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          
          
              (ingredients_a & ingredients_b).length.to_f/(ingredients_a+ingredients_b).uniq.length.to_f
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          
          
              # (ingredients_a & ingredients_b).length.to_f/(ingredients_a).uniq.length.to_f
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          
          
            end
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          
          
          
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          
          
            def related_by_ingredients
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          
          
              # Todo Will need to optimize this
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          
          
              # Activity.published.joins(:ingredients).where('activity_ingredients.ingredient_id IN(?) AND activities.id != ?', true_ingredient_ids, id).uniq
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          
          
              ids = Activity.published.joins(:ingredients).uniq.map{|a| [self.compare(a), a.id]}.reject{|a| a[0] == 0 || self.id == a[1]}.sort{|a,b| a[0] <=> b[0]}.reverse.map{|a| a[1]}
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          
          
              activities = Activity.find(ids).group_by(&:id)
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          
          
              ids.map { |id| activities[id].first }
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          
          
            end
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          
          
          
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          
          
            def featured_image
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          1
          
              if featured_image_id?
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          1
          
                featured_image_id
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          1
          
              elsif image_id?
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          1
          
                image_id
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          
          
              else
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          1
          
                step_images.last
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          
          
              end
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          
          
            end
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          
          
          
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          
          
            def to_json
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          
          
              super(
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          
          
                include: {
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          
          
                  tags: {},
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          
          
                  equipment: {
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          
          
                      only: :optional,
        
      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          1
          
                      include: {
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          
          
                          equipment: {
        
      428. 
      
        
    428. 
          
          
                              only: [:id, :title, :product_url]
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          
          
                          }
        
      430. 
      
        
    430. 
          
          
                      }
        
      431. 
      
        
    431. 
          
          
                  },
        
      432. 
      
        
    432. 
          
          
                  ingredients: {
        
      433. 
      
        
    433. 
          
          
                      only: [:note, :display_quantity, :quantity, :unit],
        
      434. 
      
        
    434. 
          
          
                      include: {
        
      435. 
      
        
    435. 
          
          
                          ingredient: {
        
      436. 
      
        
    436. 
          
          
                              only: [:id, :title, :slug, :product_url, :for_sale, :sub_activity_id]
        
      437. 
      
        
    437. 
          
          
                          }
        
      438. 
      
        
    438. 
          
          
                      }
        
      439. 
      
        
    439. 
          
          
                  },
        
      440. 
      
        
    440. 
          
          
                  steps: {
        
      441. 
      
        
    441. 
          
          
                    include: {
        
      442. 
      
        
    442. 
          
          
          
        
      443. 
      
        
    443. 
          
          
                      ingredients: {
        
      444. 
      
        
    444. 
          
          
                          only: [:note, :display_quantity, :quantity, :unit],
        
      445. 
      
        
    445. 
          
          
                          include: {
        
      446. 
      
        
    446. 
          
          
                              ingredient: {
        
      447. 
      
        
    447. 
          
          
                                  only: [:id, :title, :slug, :product_url, :for_sale, :sub_activity_id]
        
      448. 
      
        
    448. 
          
          
                              }
        
      449. 
      
        
    449. 
          
          
                          }
        
      450. 
      
        
    450. 
          
          
                      }
        
      451. 
      
        
    451. 
          
          
                    }
        
      452. 
      
        
    452. 
          
          
                  }
        
      453. 
      
        
    453. 
          
          
                }
        
      454. 
      
        
    454. 
          1
          
              )
        
      455. 
      
        
    455. 
          
          
            end
        
      456. 
      
        
    456. 
          
          
          
        
      457. 
      
        
    457. 
          
          
            # Played around with using amoeba gem but it was causing some validation problems and I got
        
      458. 
      
        
    458. 
          
          
            # too scared to mess with the (possibly wrong) inverse associations on ActivityIngredient and Activity Equipment.
        
      459. 
      
        
    459. 
          
          
            # So just opted for the most explicit solution. Could also be done by going through JSON.
        
      460. 
      
        
    460. 
          
          
            def deep_copy
        
      461. 
      
        
    461. 
          
          
              new_activity = self.dup
        
      462. 
      
        
    462. 
          
          
              new_activity.save!
        
      463. 
      
        
    463. 
          
          
          
        
      464. 
      
        
    464. 
          
          
              new_activity.source_activity = self
        
      465. 
      
        
    465. 
          1
          
              new_activity.source_type = SourceType::ADAPTED_FROM
        
      466. 
      
        
    466. 
          
          
              new_activity.published = false
        
      467. 
      
        
    467. 
          
          
              new_activity.published_at = nil
        
      468. 
      
        
    468. 
          
          
          
        
      469. 
      
        
    469. 
          
          
              self.ingredients.each do |ai|
        
      470. 
      
        
    470. 
          
          
                new_ai = ai.dup
        
      471. 
      
        
    471. 
          1
          
                new_ai.activity = new_activity
        
      472. 
      
        
    472. 
          
          
                new_activity.ingredients << new_ai
        
      473. 
      
        
    473. 
          
          
              end
        
      474. 
      
        
    474. 
          
          
          
        
      475. 
      
        
    475. 
          1
          
              self.equipment.each do |ae|
        
      476. 
      
        
    476. 
          
          
                new_ae = ae.dup
        
      477. 
      
        
    477. 
          
          
                new_ae.activity = new_activity
        
      478. 
      
        
    478. 
          
          
                new_activity.equipment << new_ae
        
      479. 
      
        
    479. 
          
          
              end
        
      480. 
      
        
    480. 
          
          
          
        
      481. 
      
        
    481. 
          
          
              self.steps.each do |as|
        
      482. 
      
        
    482. 
          
          
                new_step = as.dup
        
      483. 
      
        
    483. 
          1
          
                new_step.activity = new_activity
        
      484. 
      
        
    484. 
          
          
                new_activity.steps << new_step
        
      485. 
      
        
    485. 
          
          
          
        
      486. 
      
        
    486. 
          
          
                new_step.save!
        
      487. 
      
        
    487. 
          1
          
          
        
      488. 
      
        
    488. 
          
          
                as.ingredients.each do |si|
        
      489. 
      
        
    489. 
          
          
                  new_si = si.dup
        
      490. 
      
        
    490. 
          
          
                  new_si.step = new_step
        
      491. 
      
        
    491. 
          
          
                  new_step.ingredients << new_si
        
      492. 
      
        
    492. 
          
          
                end
        
      493. 
      
        
    493. 
          
          
              end
        
      494. 
      
        
    494. 
          
          
          
        
      495. 
      
        
    495. 
          
          
              new_activity.save!
        
      496. 
      
        
    496. 
          1
          
              new_activity
        
      497. 
      
        
    497. 
          
          
            end
        
      498. 
      
        
    498. 
          
          
          
        
      499. 
      
        
    499. 
          
          
            def containing_course
        
      500. 
      
        
    500. 
          1
          
              id = recursive_find_root("Activity", self.id)
        
      501. 
      
        
    501. 
          1
          
              return id if id == nil
        
      502. 
      
        
    502. 
          1
          
              return Assembly.find(id)
        
      503. 
      
        
    503. 
          
          
            end
        
      504. 
      
        
    504. 
          
          
          
        
      505. 
      
        
    505. 
          1

            def avatar_url
        
      522. 
      
        
    522. 
          
          
              if self.featured_image_id.blank?
        
      523. 
      
        
    523. 
          
          
                "https://d3awvtnmmsvyot.cloudfront.net/api/file/U2RccgsARPyMmzJ5Ao0c/convert?fit=crop&w=70&h=70&cache=true"
        
      524. 
      
        
    524. 
          
          
              else
        
      525.

      527. 
      
        
    527.

            def check_published
        
      546. 
      
        
    546. 
          1
          
              if self.published && self.published_at.blank?
        
      547. 
      
        
    547. 
          
          
                self.published_at = DateTime.now

      550.

            def reject_invalid_equipment(equipment_attrs)
        
      552. 
      
        
    552. 
          
          
              equipment_attrs.select! do |equipment_attr|
        
      553. 
      
        
    553. 
          
          
                [:title].all? do |test|
        
      554. 
      
        
    554. 
          
          
                  equipment_attr[test].present?
        
      555. 
      
        
    555. 
          
          
                end
        
      556. 
      
        
    556. 
          
          
              end
        
      557. 
      
        
    557. 
          
          
            end
        
      558. 
      
        
    558. 
          
          
          
        
      559. 
      
        
    559. 
          
          
            def update_and_create_equipment(equipment_attrs)
        
      560. 
      
        
    560. 
          
          
              equipment_attrs.each_with_index do |equipment_attr, idx|
        
      561. 
      
        
    561. 
          
          
                equipment_item = Equipment.find_or_create_by_title(equipment_attr[:title])
        
      562. 
      
        
    562. 
          
          
                activity_equipment = equipment.find_or_create_by_equipment_id_and_activity_id(equipment_item.id, self.id)
        
      563. 
      
        
    563. 
          
          
                activity_equipment.update_attributes(
        
      564. 
      
        
    564. 
          
          
                  optional: equipment_attr[:optional] || false,
        
      565. 
      
        
    565. 
          
          
                  equipment_order: idx
        
      566. 
      
        
    566. 
          
          
                )
        
      567. 
      
        
    567. 
          
          
                equipment_attr[:id] = equipment_item.id
        
      568. 
      
        
    568. 
          
          
              end
        
      569. 
      
        
    569. 
          
          
            end
        
      570. 
      
        
    570. 
          1
          
          
        
      571. 
      
        
    571. 
          
          
            def delete_old_equipment(equipment_attrs)
        
      572. 
      
        
    572. 
          
          
              old_equipment_ids = equipment.map(&:equipment_id) - equipment_attrs.map {|i| i[:id].to_i }
        
      573. 
      
        
    573. 
          
          
              equipment.where(equipment_id: old_equipment_ids).destroy_all
        
      574. 
      
        
    574. 
          
          
            end
        
      575. 
      
        
    575. 
          1
          
          
        
      576. 
      
        
    576. 
          
          
            def update_and_create_steps(step_attrs)
        
      577. 
      
        
    577. 
          1
          
              step_attrs.each_with_index do |step_attr, idx|
        
      578. 
      
        
    578. 
          1
          
                step_id = step_attr[:id]
        
      579. 
      
        
    579. 
          1
          
                if step_id && (step_id.to_i == 0)
        
      580. 
      
        
    580. 
          1
          
                  step_id = nil
        
      581. 
      
        
    581. 
          
          
                end
        
      582. 
      
        
    582. 
          1
          
                step = steps.find_or_create_by_id(step_id)
        
      583. 
      
        
    583. 
          1
          
                step.bypass_sanitization = self.creator.blank?
        
      584. 
      
        
    584. 
          1
          
                step.update_attributes(
        
      585. 
      
        
    585. 
          
          
                  title: step_attr[:title],
        
      586. 
      
        
    586. 
          
          
                  directions: step_attr[:directions],
        
      587. 
      
        
    587. 
          
          
                  youtube_id: step_attr[:youtube_id],
        
      588. 
      
        
    588. 
          
          
                  vimeo_id: step_attr[:vimeo_id],
        
      589. 
      
        
    589. 
          
          
                  image_id: step_attr[:image_id],
        
      590. 
      
        
    590. 
          
          
                  image_description: step_attr[:image_description],
        
      591. 
      
        
    591. 
          
          
                  audio_clip: step_attr[:audio_clip],
        
      592. 
      
        
    592. 
          
          
                  audio_title: step_attr[:audio_title],
        
      593. 
      
        
    593. 
          
          
                  step_order: idx,
        
      594. 
      
        
    594. 
          
          
                  hide_number: step_attr[:hide_number],
        
      595. 
      
        
    595. 
          1
          
                  is_aside: step_attr[:is_aside],
        
      596. 
      
        
    596. 
          
          
                  presentation_hints: step_attr[:presentation_hints],
        
      597. 
      
        
    597. 
          
          
                  extra: step_attr[:extra]
        
      598. 
      
        
    598. 
          
          
                )
        
      599. 
      
        
    599. 
          1
          
                step.update_ingredients_json(step_attr[:ingredients])
        
      600. 
      
        
    600. 
          1
          
                step_attr[:id] = step.id
        
      601. 
      
        
    601. 
          
          
              end
        
      602. 
      
        
    602. 
          
          
            end
        
      603. 
      
        
    603. 
          1
          
          
        
      604. 
      
        
    604. 
          
          
            def delete_old_steps(step_attrs)
        
      605. 
      
        
    605. 
          1
          
              old_step_ids = steps.map(&:id) - step_attrs.map {|i| i[:id].to_i }
        
      606. 
      
        
    606. 
          1
          
              steps.where(id: old_step_ids).destroy_all
        
      607. 
      
        
    607. 
          
          
            end
        
      608. 
      
        
    608. 
          
          
          
        
      609. 
      
        
    609. 
          
          
            def delete_old_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      610. 
      
        
    610. 
          
          
              old_ingredient_ids = ingredients.map(&:ingredient_id) - ingredient_attrs.map {|i| i[:id].to_i }
        
      611. 
      
        
    611. 
          
          
              ingredients.where(ingredient_id: old_ingredient_ids).destroy_all
        
      612. 
      
        
    612. 
          1
          
            end
        
      613. 
      
        
    613. 
          
          
          
        
      614. 
      
        
    614. 
          
          
            def update_and_create_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      615. 
      
        
    615. 
          
          
              ingredient_attrs.each_with_index do |ingredient_attr, idx|
        
      616. 
      
        
    616. 
          
          
                title = ingredient_attr[:title].strip
        
      617. 
      
        
    617. 
          
          
                ingredient = Ingredient.find_or_create_by_subactivity_or_ingredient_title(title)
        
      618. 
      
        
    618. 
          
          
                activity_ingredient = ingredients.find_or_create_by_ingredient_id_and_activity_id(ingredient.id, self.id)
        
      619. 
      
        
    619. 
          
          
                activity_ingredient.update_attributes(
        
      620. 
      
        
    620. 
          
          
                    note: ingredient_attr[:note],
        
      621. 
      
        
    621. 
          
          
                    display_quantity: ingredient_attr[:display_quantity],
        
      622. 
      
        
    622. 
          
          
                    unit: ingredient_attr[:unit],
        
      623. 
      
        
    623. 
          
          
                    ingredient_order: idx
        
      624. 
      
        
    624. 
          
          
                )
        
      625. 
      
        
    625. 
          
          
                ingredient_attr[:id] = ingredient.id
        
      626. 
      
        
    626. 
          
          
              end
        
      627. 
      
        
    627. 
          
          
            end
        
      628. 
      
        
    628. 
          
          
          
        
      629. 
      
        
    629. 
          
          
            def reject_invalid_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      630. 
      
        
    630. 
          
          
              ingredient_attrs.select! do |ingredient_attr|
        
      631. 
      
        
    631. 
          
          
                [:title, :unit].all? do |test|
        
      632. 
      
        
    632. 
          
          
                  ingredient_attr[test].present?
        
      633. 
      
        
    633. 
          
          
                end
        
      634. 
      
        
    634. 
          
          
              end
        
      635. 
      
        
    635. 
          
          
            end
        
      636. 
      
        
    636. 
          
          
          
        
      637. 
      
        
    637. 
          
          
            private
        
      638. 
      
        
    638. 
          
          
              # A given node (leaf or interior) in an Assemly tree can have multiple parents.
        
      639. 
      
        
    639. 
          
          
            # This is rare, typically e.g. an Activity will be in a single class, and this
        
      640. 
      
        
    640. 
          
          
            # will find it. But what sometimes happens is an activity gets put in one sub-assembly, which is in turn put in a class, then the sub-assembly is removed
        
      641. 
      
        
    641. 
          
          
            # from the class and the same process is repeated, but the original is never deleted.
        
      642. 
      
        
    642. 
          
          
            # So you end up with two paths [Class->Group->Activity] and [Defunct Group->Activity]
        
      643. 
      
        
    643. 
          
          
            # This function is written to make sure in that case we find the class.
        
      644. 
      
        
    644. 
          
          
            # We don't deal with the case where the same activity is in multiple real classes,
        
      645. 
      
        
    645. 
          
          
            # in that case one arbitrary one is found.
        
      646. 
      
        
    646. 
          
          
            def recursive_find_root(includable_type, includable_id)
        
      647. 
      
        
    647. 
          1
          
              if includable_type == "Assembly"
        
      648. 
      
        
    648. 
          1
          
                assembly = Assembly.find(includable_id)
        
      649. 
      
        
    649. 
          
          
          
        
      650. 
      
        
    650. 
          
          
                # Winner if we hit a valid root container
        
      651. 
      
        
    651. 
          1
          
                return assembly if assembly.assembly_type == "Course" || assembly.assembly_type == "Project" || assembly.assembly_type == "Recipe Development"
        
      652. 
      
        
    652. 
          
          
              end
        
      653. 
      
        
    653. 
          
          
          
        
      654. 
      
        
    654. 
          1
          
              AssemblyInclusion.where(includable_type: includable_type, includable_id: includable_id).each do |ai|
        
      655. 
      
        
    655. 
          
          
          
        
      656. 
      
        
    656. 
          
          
                # Take first parent that is a winner
        
      657. 
      
        
    657. 
          1
          
                result = recursive_find_root("Assembly", ai.assembly_id)
        
      658. 
      
        
    658. 
          1
          
                return result if result.present?
        
      659. 
      
        
    659. 
          
          
              end
        
      660. 
      
        
    660. 
          
          
          
        
      661. 
      
        
    661. 
          
          
              # Loser
        
      662. 
      
        
    662. 
          
          
              return nil
        
      663. 
      
        
    663. 
          
          
            end
        
      664. 
      
        
    664. 
          
          
          end
        
      665.

    app/models/activity_equipment.rb

            validates :equipment_id, presence: true

    app/models/actor_address.rb

    1.

          class ActorAddress < ActiveRecord::Base
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            belongs_to :actor, polymorphic: true
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
            ADDRESS_LENGTH = 16
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
            HASHID_SALT = '3cc6500d43f5b8456bf164a313889639'
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
            SEQUENCE_GENERATED_ADDRESS_PREFIX = 'a00000'
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
            @@hashids = Hashids.new(HASHID_SALT, ADDRESS_LENGTH - SEQUENCE_GENERATED_ADDRESS_PREFIX.length, '01233456789abcdef')
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
            def addressable_addresses
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              if self.actor_type == 'User'
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                actor_class = User
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                method = 'circulator_ids'
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                other_actor = 'Circulator'
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              elsif self.actor_type == 'Circulator'
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                actor_class = Circulator
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                method = 'user_ids'
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                other_actor = 'User'
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              else
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                logger.debug "No addressable actors for #{self.actor_type}"
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                return []
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              actor = actor_class.find(self.actor_id)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              other_ids = actor.method(method).call()
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              logger.debug "Trying to find #{other_actor} #{other_ids}"
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              addresses = ActorAddress.where(
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                actor_type: other_actor, actor_id: other_ids, status: 'active'
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              )
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              addresses
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
            def self.create_for_actor(actor, opts = {})
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
              logger.info "Creating new ActorAddress for #{actor} with opts #{opts.inspect}"
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
              aa = ActorAddress.new()
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
              aa.actor = actor
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
              if opts.has_key? :client_metadata
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
                aa.client_metadata = opts[:client_metadata]
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
              aa.issued_at = Time.now.to_i
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
              aa.status = 'active' # Nothing beats ad-hoc enums - what's the modern rails way?
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
              if opts.has_key? :unique_key
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                aa.unique_key = opts[:unique_key]
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
              ActorAddress.transaction do
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                # save first only so we can re-use id for address_id when not specified
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                aa.save!
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                if opts.has_key? :address_id
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
                  address_id = opts[:address_id]
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  # TODO -clean up exceptions and bubble up to API level
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
                  unless address_id.length == 16
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    throw Error.new ("Invalid address_id length [#{address_id.length}] - length must be 16 hex chars")
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  unless address_id =~ /^[0-9a-f]+$/
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    throw Error.new ("Invalid address_id [#{address_id}] contains non-hex characters")
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  aa.address_id = address_id
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                else
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
                  hashid = SEQUENCE_GENERATED_ADDRESS_PREFIX + @@hashids.encode(aa.id)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                  if hashid.length > ADDRESS_LENGTH
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                    # This should never happpen given input is auto-incrementing field
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    raise "Hashid length is too long - id [#{hashid}]"
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                  end
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
                  aa.address_id = hashid
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
                aa.save!
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
              logger.info ("Created new ActorAddress #{aa.inspect}")
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
              aa
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
            end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
            def self.create_for_circulator(circulator, opts = {})
        
      76.

          1
          
              opts[:client_metadata] = 'circulator'
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
              opts[:address_id] = circulator.circulator_id
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
              self.create_for_actor(circulator, opts)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
            end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          1
          
            def self.create_for_user(user, opts = {})

          1
          
              self.create_for_actor(user, opts)

    83. 
          
          
            end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85.
