            def current_token (opts = {}) #exp = nil, restrict_to = nil)
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
              exp = opts[:exp]
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
              restrict_to = opts[:restrict_to]
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
              AuthToken.new claim(exp = exp, restrict_to = restrict_to)
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
            end
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          1
          
            def claim (exp = nil, restrict_to = nil)
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
              c = {:iat => self.issued_at,
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
               :a => self.address_id,
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
               :seq => self.sequence}
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          1
          
              c[:exp] = exp if exp
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
              c[:restrictTo] = restrict_to if restrict_to
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
              c
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
            end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
            def tentative_next_token
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              modified_claim = claim
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
          
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              modified_claim[:seq] += 1
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
              modified_claim[:iat] = Time.now.to_i
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              AuthToken.new modified_claim
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
            end
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
          
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1
          
            def increment_to(token)
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
              unless valid_token?(token, 1)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                raise "Invalid token"
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
              end
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              self.issued_at = token['iat']
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              self.sequence = self.sequence + 1
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              self.save
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
            end
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
            # TODO - fork here
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
            def valid_token?(auth_token, sequence_offset = 0, restrict_to = nil)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
              logger.info "Testing validity of #{auth_token.inspect}"
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
              return false if auth_token.nil?
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
              valid = true
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
              auth_claim = auth_token.claim
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
          
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
              old_address_matches = self.address_id == auth_claim[:address_id]
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
              new_address_matches = self.address_id == auth_claim[:a]
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              # either old or new should match, both matching should never happen and
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
              # neither matching is an invalid token
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
              if !(old_address_matches ^ new_address_matches)
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                logger.info "Address does not match"
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                valid = false
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
              end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
              if (self.sequence + sequence_offset) != auth_claim[:seq]
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
                logger.info "Sequence number does not match"
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
                valid = false
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
              if (auth_claim['restrictTo'] || restrict_to) && auth_claim['restrictTo'] != restrict_to
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                logger.info "Required restriction #{restrict_to} does not match"
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                valid = false
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
              if self.revoked?
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                logger.info "Token is revoked"
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                valid = false
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
              end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
              time_now = Time.now.to_i
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
              if auth_claim[:exp] && auth_claim[:exp] <= time_now
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                logger.info "Token expired"
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                valid = false
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
              unless valid
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
                logger.info "Invalid token.  Token claim: [#{auth_claim.inspect}] Actor address: [#{self.inspect}]"
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
              return valid
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
            end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
            def double_increment()
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
              self.sequence = self.sequence + 2
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              self.save
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
            end
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
            def revoke
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
              self.status = 'revoked'
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
              self.save
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
            end
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
            def revoked?
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
              self.status == "revoked"
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
            end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
            # fork here
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
            def self.find_for_token(token)
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
              logger.info "Finding actor address for token [#{token.inspect}]"
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
              old_address_id = token.claim['address_id']
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          1
          
              new_address_id = token.claim['a']
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
              if new_address_id
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
                return ActorAddress.where(address_id: new_address_id).first
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
              elsif old_address_id
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1
          
                actor_type = actor_type_from_token(token)
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          1
          
                actor_id = token.claim[actor_type]['id']
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
                aa = ActorAddress.where(actor_type: actor_type, actor_id: actor_id, address_id: old_address_id).first
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
                unless aa
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                  logger.info ("No ActorAddress found for token #{token.claim.inspect}")
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                  return nil
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
                return aa
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
              else
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                logger.info ("Token contains neither 'address_id' or 'a' value")
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                return nil
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                # Old style token
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
          
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
          
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
            end
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
            def self.find_for_user_and_unique_key(user, unique_key)
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
              actor_type = 'User'
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
              actor_id = user.id
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          1
          
              aa = ActorAddress.where(actor_type: actor_type, actor_id: actor_id, unique_key: unique_key).first
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
              unless aa
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
                logger.info ("No ActorAddress found for user [#{user.inspect}] and unique key [#{unique_key}]")
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
                return nil
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
              end
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
              aa
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
            end
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
            private
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
          
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          1
          
            def self.actor_type_from_token (token)
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          1
          
              if token.claim.has_key?("User")
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
                "User"
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
              elsif token.claim.has_key?("Circulator")
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                "Circulator"
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
              else
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                raise "Token does not contain valid actor type"
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
              end
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
            end
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
          end
        
      229.

            accepts_nested_attributes_for :assembly_inclusions, allow_destroy: true
        
      26.

      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
            ASSEMBLY_TYPE_SELECTION = ['Course', 'Project', 'Group', 'Recipe Development', 'Kit']

            def to_jwt(key = nil)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
              unless key
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                key = OpenSSL::PKey::RSA.new ENV["AUTH_SECRET_KEY"], 'cooksmarter'
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              end

    20. 
          1

          1

          1
          
            def self.from_string(token)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
              begin
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                key = OpenSSL::PKey::RSA.new ENV["AUTH_SECRET_KEY"], 'cooksmarter'
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                claim = JSON::JWT.decode(token, key.to_s)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                AuthToken.new claim
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
              rescue JSON::JWT::InvalidFormat => e
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                Rails.logger.warn "[auth] invalid token format for token [#{token}]"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                raise e
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              rescue JSON::JWS::VerificationFailed => e
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                Rails.logger.warn "[auth] token verification failed for token [#{token}]"
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                raise e
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              end
        
      36.

            def merge(group)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              # Just to be sure
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              group.delete(self)

      29.

      32.

                  equipment.destroy
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                else

    35.

            def self.scoped_by(trackable_type, action)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              # Returns a set of events by trackable type and action
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              # example 1: Event.scoped_by('Inclusion', 'show') returns all events where any user viewed a activity inside a course
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              # example 2: current_user.events.scoped_by('Upload', 'create') returns events where the current user uploaded a photo
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              symbolized_trackable_type = trackable_type.downcase.pluralize.to_sym
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              results = joins("INNER JOIN #{symbolized_trackable_type} ON #{symbolized_trackable_type}.id = events.trackable_id").where(trackable_type: trackable_type).where(action: action)

            def determine_published

            before_save :fix_title
        
      59.

          1
          
            def fix_title
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
              if self.sub_activity_id?
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
                self.title= Activity.find_by_id(self.sub_activity_id).title
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              end
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
              self.title = self.title.strip if self.title?
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
              true
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
            end
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
            def title
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          =begin
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              if sub_activity_id?
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                act = Activity.find_by_id(sub_activity_id)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71.

            def self.maybe_move_title_to_note(oi, title)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              old_title = oi.ingredient.title
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              new_title, new_note = old_title.split(',')
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              if new_note
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                new_title.strip!
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                new_note.strip!
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                if (new_title.downcase == title.downcase) && (! new_note.blank?)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  if oi.note.blank?
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                    oi.note = new_note
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                  else
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                    oi.note = new_note + ", " + oi.note
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                  end
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                  oi.save
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                  oi.reload
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              end
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
            end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1

      125.

            def merge_in_useful_details(other)
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
              self.product_url = other.product_url if self.product_url.to_s == ''
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              self.density = other.density if ! self.density
        
      128. 
      
        
    128.

      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
              self.youtube_id = other.youtube_id if self.youtube_id.to_s == ''
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              self.text_fields = other.text_fields if self.text_fields.to_s == ''
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
              other.tag_list.each { |tag| self.tag_list.add(tag) }
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
            end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
            # Replace all uses (in both activities and steps) of every ingredient in group with the self ingredient
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
            def merge(group)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              # Just to be sure
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
              group.delete(self)
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
              # If the ones we are going to delete have any useful wiki details in fields that
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              # are blank in the final ingredient, copy them over.
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
              group.each do |ingredient|
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                self.merge_in_useful_details(ingredient)
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
              end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              self.save
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
              group.each do |ingredient|
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                ActivityIngredient.where(ingredient_id: ingredient.id).each do |ai|
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                  Ingredient.maybe_move_title_to_note(ai, self.title)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                  ai.ingredient = self
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                  ai.save
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                StepIngredient.where(ingredient_id: ingredient.id).each do |si|
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                  Ingredient.maybe_move_title_to_note(si, self.title)
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                  si.ingredient = self
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                  si.save
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                end
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                ingredient.reload
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                if (ingredient.activities.count == 0) && (ingredient.steps.count == 0)
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                  ingredient.destroy
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                else
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                  raise "Unexpected dependencies remain for #{ingredient.title} (id: #{ingredient.id})... not deleting"
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                end
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              end
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              self.reload
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
            end
        
      170.

            def well_edited

            def avatar_url

              if self.image_id.blank?

                "https://d3awvtnmmsvyot.cloudfront.net/api/file/U2RccgsARPyMmzJ5Ao0c/convert?fit=crop&w=70&h=70&cache=true"

            def sanitize_text_fields
        
      186.

              if self.text_fields && self.text_fields.class.to_s == "Hash"
        
      187.

    188.

    189.

          class PremiumGiftCertificate < ActiveRecord::Base

    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5.

          1
          
            scope :free_gifts, -> { where(price: 0) }
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
            scope :unredeemed, -> { where(redeemed: false) }
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
            include ActsAsChargeable
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            after_initialize do
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
              if ! self.token
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                loop do
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                  # 6 chars incluing 0-9, a-z, should give us 36^6 = 2,176,782,336 possibilities. Enough
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                  # to keep crackers at bay. Loop to avoid (extremely rare) duplicate.
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                  self.token = SecureRandom.urlsafe_base64.downcase.delete('_-')[0..5]
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                  break unless PremiumGiftCertificate.unscoped.exists?(token: self.token)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                end
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
            end
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            def self.redeem(user, token)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
              gc = PremiumGiftCertificate.where(token: token.to_s).last
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
              raise "Gift certificate #{token} not found" if gc == nil
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
              raise "Gift certificate #{token} already redeemed" if gc.redeemed
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
              enrollment = nil
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
              PremiumGiftCertificate.transaction do
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                gc.redeemed = true
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                gc.save!
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                user.make_premium_member(gc.price)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
            end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          end

            def store_quantity

            def self.find_for_user(user)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              shopify_customer = ShopifyAPI::Customer.search(:query => "email:\"#{user.email}\"").first
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              if shopify_customer.nil?
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info "No shopify customer found with email [#{user.email}]"
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                return nil
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              # The search API is not consistent, not even eventually, find seems better.
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              shopify_customer_id = shopify_customer.id
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              shopify_customer = ShopifyAPI::Customer.find(shopify_customer_id)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              if shopify_customer.nil?
        
      21. 
      
        
    21.

      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24.

      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              # address but that email is now attached to a different ChefSteps account.
        
      26. 
      
        
    26.

              # closes the potential security hole.

            def self.create_for_user(user)

            def self.sync_user(user)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info "Syncing user [#{user.id}] to shopify"
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              customer = find_for_user(user)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              if customer.nil?
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                customer = create_for_user(user)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info "Created customer [#{customer.inspect}]"
        
      53. 
      
        
    53.

      54.

                Rails.logger.info "Found shopify customer [#{customer.inspect}]"
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              customer.sync_tags!
        
      58. 
      
        
    58.

      59.

      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
            end
        
      61.

          1
          
            def sync_tags!
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              current_tags = @shopify_customer.tags.split(',').sort!.collect {|tag| tag.strip}
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              tags = Array.new(current_tags)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              tags.delete PREMIUM_MEMBER_TAG
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              tags.delete JOULE_PREMIUM_DISCOUNT_TAG
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
            
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              if @user.premium?
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                tags << PREMIUM_MEMBER_TAG
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              if @user.can_receive_circulator_discount?
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                tags << JOULE_PREMIUM_DISCOUNT_TAG
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              if current_tags != tags
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info "Current tags #{current_tags.inspect} should be #{tags.inspect}.  Syncing"
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                @shopify_customer.tags = tags
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                @shopify_customer.save!
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              else
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info "Current tags #{current_tags.inspect} is #{tags.inspect}.  Not syncing"
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              end
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
            end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            
        
      84. 
      
        
    84.

    app/models/shopify/multipass.rb

    1. 
          
          
          # Adapted from shopping_controller
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
          class Shopify::Multipass
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
            def initialize
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              ### Use the Multipass secret to derive two cryptographic keys,
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              ### one for encryption, one for signing
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
              key_material = OpenSSL::Digest::Digest.new("sha256").digest(Rails.configuration.shopify[:multipass_secret])
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
              @encryption_key = key_material[ 0,16]
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
              @signature_key  = key_material[16,16]
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            end
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
            def self.for_user(user, return_to)
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
              multipass = Shopify::Multipass.new
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              # TODO - add user IP
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
              user_hash = 
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                {
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                  email: user.email,
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                  first_name: user.name.split(' ')[0],
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                  last_name: (user.name.split(' ').size > 1 ? user.name.split(' ')[1] : nil),
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  identifier: user.id,
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                  return_to: return_to
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                }
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
              multipass.generate_token(user_hash)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
            def generate_token(customer_data_hash)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              ### Store the current time in ISO8601 format.
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              ### The token will only be valid for a small timeframe around this timestamp.
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
              customer_data_hash["created_at"] = Time.now.iso8601
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
              Rails.logger.info("Generating multipass token with data [#{customer_data_hash.inspect}]")
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              ### Serialize the customer data to JSON and encrypt it
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
              ciphertext = encrypt(customer_data_hash.to_json)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              ### Create a signature (message authentication code) of the ciphertext
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              ### and encode everything using URL-safe Base64 (RFC 4648)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
              Base64.urlsafe_encode64(ciphertext + sign(ciphertext))
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
            end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
            private
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
            def encrypt(plaintext)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
              cipher = OpenSSL::Cipher::Cipher.new("aes-128-cbc")
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
              cipher.encrypt
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
              cipher.key = @encryption_key
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              ### Use a random IV
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
              cipher.iv = iv = cipher.random_iv
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              ### Use IV as first block of ciphertext
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
              iv + cipher.update(plaintext) + cipher.final
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
            end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
            def sign(data)
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
              OpenSSL::HMAC.digest("sha256", @signature_key, data)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
            end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          end
        
      57.

            # Processes a shopify order.
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
            #  
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
            # For now, this means:
        
      43.

            #  * Making a customer premium when a customer purchases Premium or Joule

      50.

            # A note on shopify fulfillment object:  Since there is a 1:1 mapping between
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
            # fulfillments in Shopify and line item units, premium membership associated
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
            # with Joule will not have an associated fulfillment object.
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
            def process!
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              # TODO - fix order processing race condition - probably optimistic locking on user
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info "Processing order [#{@api_order.id}] with financial_status [#{@api_order.financial_status}] and fulfillment_status [#{@api_order.fulfillment_status}]"
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              if all_but_joule_fulfilled?
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info "Order already fulfilled."
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                return
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
          
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              # TODO - Mark as starting fulfillment
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              # TODO - handle orders in 'bad' states
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              # TODO - get unfulfilled line items but for now assume all unfulfilled
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              all_but_joule_fulfilled = true
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              order_contains_joule = false
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              @api_order.line_items.each do |item|
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info "Processing line item [#{item.id}]"
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                if item.fulfillment_status == 'fulfilled'
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info "Line item already fulfilled"
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  next
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                # Hard code the SKUs for now, we can talk when we have more than two
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                if item.sku == JOULE_SKU
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                  order_contains_joule = true
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                  # TODO - add synchronization since we're not creating fulfilment objects here
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                  fulfill_premium(item, false)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                  # TODO: actually check that premium discount was used
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                  user.use_premium_discount
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                elsif item.sku == PREMIUM_SKU
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                  if !gift_order? && item.quantity > 1
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    raise "Order contains more than one non-gift premium."
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  end
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                  # TODO - check premium limit for non-gift
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  fulfill_premium(item, true)
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                else
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                  raise "Unknown product sku [#{item.sku}]"
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                end
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
              if order_contains_joule
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                JouleConfirmationMailer.prepare(user).deliver
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
              end
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              if order_contains_joule && all_but_joule_fulfilled
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                all_but_joule = ShopifyAPI::Metafield.new({:namespace => METAFIELD_NAMESPACE,
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                  :key => ALL_BUT_JOULE_FULFILLED_METAFIELD_NAME,
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                  :value_type => 'string',
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                  :value => 'true'})
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                @api_order.add_metafield(all_but_joule)
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
          
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
              initial_fulfillment_latency = Time.now - Time.parse(@api_order.created_at)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info "Initial fulfillment latency [#{initial_fulfillment_latency}]"
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              Librato.timing 'shopify.fulfillment.initial.latency', initial_fulfillment_latency
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
          
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
              # Sync premium / discount status
        
      109.

              Shopify::Customer.sync_user(user)

            end

            # PremiumWelcomeMailer.prepare(@user, data[:circulator_sale]).deliver rescue nil

          1
          
            def send_gift_receipt(item)
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              # TODO - remove dupe
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              #user = User.find(@api_order.customer.multipass_identifier)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121.

      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              pgc = PremiumGiftCertificate.create!(purchaser_id: user.id, price: item.price, redeemed: false)
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
              PremiumGiftCertificateMailer.prepare(user, pgc.token).deliver
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
            end
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126.

          1
          
            def all_but_joule_fulfilled?
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              return true if @api_order.fulfillment_status == 'fulfilled'
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
              return true if @api_order.metafields.find { |metafield|
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                metafield.key == ALL_BUT_JOULE_FULFILLED_METAFIELD_NAME && metafield.value == 'true' }
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              return false
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
            end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
            def gift_order?
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              gift_attribute = @api_order.note_attributes.find {|attr| attr.name == 'gift-order'}
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info("Found gift-order attribute #{gift_attribute.inspect}")
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              return !gift_attribute.nil?
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
            end
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
            
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
            def fulfill_premium(item, should_fulfill)
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              item.quantity.times do
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                if gift_order?
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  send_gift_receipt(item)
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                if should_fulfill
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                  ShopifyAPI::Fulfillment.create(
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                    :order_id => @api_order.id,
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                    :line_items => [{:id => item.id, :quantity => 1}])
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                else
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                  # TODO - create metafield for fulfilled quantity
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
              if !gift_order?
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                previously_premium = user.premium?
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                user.make_premium_member(item.price)
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                # use should_fulfill as a proxy for hackish proxy for contains joule
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                unless previously_premium || 
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                  PremiumWelcomeMailer.prepare(user, !should_fulfill).deliver
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                end
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
            end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
            
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
            def send_analytics()  
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
              segment_data = build_segment_data
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info "Segment data: #{segment_data}"
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
              if !Analytics.track(segment_data)
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                msg = "Error: problem tracking #{segment_data[:event]} #{segment_data}"
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.error(msg)
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                raise msg
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
              end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
              Analytics.identify(user_id: user.id, traits: {joule_purchase_count: user.joule_purchase_count})
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
              Analytics.flush()
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              send_to_ga(build_transaction_ga_data)
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
              @api_order.line_items.each do |line_item|
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                send_to_ga(build_product_ga_data(line_item))
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
              end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
            end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
            
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
            def build_segment_data
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
              data = extract_analytics_data
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
            
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
              products = @api_order.line_items.collect do |item|
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                {
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                  id: item.sku,
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                  sku: item.sku,
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                  name: item.title,
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                  price: item.price,
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                  quantity: item.quantity
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                }
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              end
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
            
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
              {
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                event: 'Completed Order Workaround',
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                user_id: user.id,
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                context: {
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                  'GoogleAnalytics' => {
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                    clientId: data['google_analytics_client_id']
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                  },
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                  campaign: {
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                    name: data['utm_campaign'],
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                    source: data['utm_source'],
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                    medium: data['utm_medium'],
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
                    term: data['utm_term'],
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
                    content: data['utm_content']
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                  },
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                  referrer: {
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                    url: data['referrer']
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                  }
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                },
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
          
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                properties: {
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                  # Pre shopify, there used to be a label attribute set to the SKU
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                  product_skus: @api_order.line_items.collect{|line_item| line_item.sku},
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                  orderId: @api_order.id,
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                  total: @api_order.total_price,
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                  revenue: @api_order.subtotal_price,
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                  tax: @api_order.total_tax,
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                  shipping: 0,
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                  discount: @api_order.total_discounts,
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                  gift: gift_order?,
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                  currency: 'USD',
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                  products: products,
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                }
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
              }
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
            
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
            end
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
          
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
            # All these gibberish abbreviations are defined here:
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
            # https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/protocol/v1/parameters
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
            def build_common_ga_data
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
              data = extract_analytics_data
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
          
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
              ga_common = {
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                'v' => 1,
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                'tid' => ENV['GA_TRACKING_ID'],
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                'cid' => data['google_analytics_client_id'],
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                'uid' => user.id,
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
                'cu' => 'USD',
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                'ti' => @api_order.id
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
              }
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
              ga_common['cn'] = data['utm_campaign'] if data['utm_campaign']
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
              ga_common['cs'] = data['utm_source'] if data['utm_source']
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
              ga_common['cm'] = data['utm_medium'] if data['utm_medium']
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
              ga_common['cc'] = data['utm_content'] if data['utm_content']
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
              ga_common['ck'] = data['utm_term'] if data['utm_term']
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
              ga_common['gclid'] = data['gclid'] if data['gclid']
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
              return ga_common
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
            end
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
            
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
            def build_transaction_ga_data
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
              ga_transaction = {
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
                't' => 'transaction',
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
                'ts' => 0,
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
                'tr' => @api_order.subtotal_price,
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
                'tt' => @api_order.total_tax,
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
              }.merge(build_common_ga_data)
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
            end
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
          
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
            def build_product_ga_data (line_item)
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
              ga_product = {
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
                't' => 'item',
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
                'iq' => line_item.quantity,
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
                'ip' => line_item.price,
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
                'in' => line_item.title,
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
                'ic' => line_item.sku
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
              }.merge(build_common_ga_data)
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          
          
            end
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
            
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          1
          
            def google_analytics_client_id(ga_cookie)
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
              ga_cookie.gsub(/^GA\d\.\d\./, '')
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
            end
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
            
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          1
          
            def send_to_ga payload
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
              validation_url = 'https://www.google-analytics.com/debug/collect'
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
              validate_result = HTTParty.post(validation_url, { body: payload })
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info("Validator result: #{validate_result.body.inspect}")
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
              if !JSON::parse(validate_result.body)['hitParsingResult'].first['valid']
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
                msg = "Error: invalid payload sent to GA: #{payload.inspect} #{validate_result.body.inspect}"
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.error(msg)
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
                raise msg
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
              end
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info "GA data: #{payload}"
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
              submit_url = 'http://www.google-analytics.com/collect'
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
              HTTParty.post(submit_url, { body: payload })
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
            end
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
          
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          1
          
            def extract_analytics_data
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
              # There is JS in the shopify cart that copies the utm and _ga cookies to note attributes
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
              data = {}
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          
          
                  
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
              utm_data = @api_order.note_attributes.find {|attr| attr.name == 'utm'}
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
              if utm_data
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
                JSON.parse(utm_data.value).each_pair {|k,v| data[k] = v }
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
              end
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
              
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
              ga_data = @api_order.note_attributes.find {|attr| attr.name == 'ga'}
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
              data['google_analytics_client_id'] = google_analytics_client_id(ga_data.value) if ga_data
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
          
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          
          
              return data
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
            end
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
          end
        
      303.

            def title(index=nil)

            def update_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              reject_invalid_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              update_and_create_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      29.

              delete_old_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              self
        
      31.

            end
        
      32.

          1
          
            def update_ingredients_json(ingredients_attrs)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              # Easiest just to be rid of all of the old join records, we'll make them from scratch
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
              ingredients.destroy_all()
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
              ingredients.reload()
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
              if ingredients_attrs
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                ingredients_attrs.each_with_index do |i, idx|
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                  title = i[:ingredient][:title]
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  unless title.nil? || title.blank?
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                    title.strip!
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                    the_ingredient = Ingredient.find_or_create_by_id_or_subactivity_or_ingredient_title(i[:ingredient][:id], title)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                    StepIngredient.create!({
        
      46.

      47.

      49.

      52.

      53.

                  end
        
      54.

            def reject_invalid_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              ingredient_attrs.select! do |ingredient_attr|
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                [:title, :unit].all? do |test|
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                  ingredient_attr[test].present?
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
            end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
            def update_and_create_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              ingredient_attrs.each_with_index do |ingredient_attr, idx|
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                title = ingredient_attr[:title].strip
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                ingredient = Ingredient.find_or_create_by_subactivity_or_ingredient_title(title)
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                step_ingredient = ingredients.find_or_create_by_ingredient_id_and_step_id(ingredient.id, self.id)
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                step_ingredient.update_attributes(
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                  note: ingredient_attr[:note],
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                  display_quantity: ingredient_attr[:display_quantity],
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                  unit: ingredient_attr[:unit],
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                  ingredient_order: idx
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                )
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                ingredient_attr[:id] = ingredient.id
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
            def delete_old_ingredients(ingredient_attrs)
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              old_ingredient_ids = ingredients.map(&:ingredient_id) - ingredient_attrs.map {|i| i[:id].to_i }
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              ingredients.where(ingredient_id: old_ingredient_ids).destroy_all
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
            end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          end
        
      90.
