            def send_to_stripe
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info("Starting send_to_stripe")
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              stripe_user = self.create_or_update_user
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              begin
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Creating Stripe Order")
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                stripe = Stripe::Order.create(self.stripe_order, {idempotency_key: self.idempotency_key})
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              rescue Stripe::CardError => e
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.error("Stripe Order #{id} - Error Creating order in Stripe! #{stripe_order.inspect}")
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                Librato.increment("credit_card.declined")
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                if data['circulator_sale']
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.error("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Joule Declined Mail")
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                  DeclinedMailer.joule(user).deliver rescue nil
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                else
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.error("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Premium Declined Mail")
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  DeclinedMailer.premium(user).deliver rescue nil
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                end
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                raise e
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
              end
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info("Received Stripe info\n #{stripe.inspect}")
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
          
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              if stripe.status != 'paid'
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} not paid, charging now")
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                begin
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                  stripe_charge = stripe.pay({customer: stripe_user.id}, {idempotency_key: (self.idempotency_key+"A")})
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                rescue Stripe::CardError => e
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.error("Stripe Order #{id} - Error charging order in Stripe! #{stripe_order.inspect}")
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                  Librato.increment("credit_card.declined")
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                  if data['circulator_sale']
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                    Rails.logger.error("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Joule Declined Mail")
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                    DeclinedMailer.joule(user).deliver rescue nil
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  else
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                    Rails.logger.error("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Premium Declined Mail")
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                    DeclinedMailer.premium(user).deliver rescue nil
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                  end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  raise e
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Stripe Charge: #{stripe_charge.inspect}")
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                if stripe_charge.status == 'paid'
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                  Librato.increment("credit_card.charged")
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} has been collected. Sending Analytics")
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  # Analytics.track 99% good here
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Updating user")
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                  self.submitted = true
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                  self.save
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Receipt")
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                  GenericReceiptMailer.prepare(self, stripe_charge).deliver rescue nil
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                  if data['circulator_sale'] && !data['gift']
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                    Rails.logger.info "Stripe Order #{id} - Incrementing user joule purchase count"
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                    user.joule_purchased rescue nil
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                  end
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
          
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                  if data['gift']
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                    Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Gift Receipt")
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                    pgc = PremiumGiftCertificate.create!(purchaser_id: user.id, price: data['price'], redeemed: false) rescue nil
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                    PremiumGiftCertificateMailer.prepare(user, pgc.token).deliver rescue nil
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                  end
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                  # Analytics.track mostly good here
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                  if data['circulator_sale']
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                    JouleConfirmationMailer.prepare(user).deliver rescue nil
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                  end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Queueing UserSync")
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                  Resque.enqueue(UserSync, user.id)
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                  # Trying analytics.track with a manual flush here until we
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                  # really resolve this issue.
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Analytics")
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                  self.analytics(stripe_charge)
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                else
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                  # We failed to collect the money for some reason
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Failed to move into status paid")
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Stripe Charge: #{stripe_charge.inspect}")
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                  Librato.increment("credit_card.declined")
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                  if data['circulator_sale']
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                    Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Joule declined email")
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                    DeclinedMailer.joule(user).deliver rescue nil
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                  else
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                    Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Premium declined email")
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                    DeclinedMailer.premium(user).deliver rescue nil
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
                  end
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Removing premium")
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                  user.remove_premium_membership
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
              end
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
          
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
              if ! data['gift']
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                # Normally redundant
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Making Premium")
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                self.user.make_premium_member(data['price'])
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
              end
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
          
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
              # Always mark a circulator sale as using the discount (because they are either buying it with premium or using their discount)
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
              if data['circulator_sale'] #data['premium_discount'] # This would be only to use the discount if they purchased the cheaper circulator
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Using Discount")
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                user.use_premium_discount
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
            end
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
            def description
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              if data['circulator_sale']
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                if data['premium_discount']
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                  "ChefSteps Joule with Premium Discount"
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                else
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
                  "ChefSteps Joule and Premium"
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
                end
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
              else
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                "ChefSteps Premium"
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              end
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
            end
        
      210.

          1
          
            def analytics(stripe_charge)
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
              tax_item = stripe_charge.items.detect{|item| item.type == 'tax'}
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
              discount_item = stripe_charge.items.detect{|item| item.type == 'discount'}
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
              purchased_item = stripe_charge.items.detect{|item| item.type == 'sku'}
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
              segment_data = {
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                event: 'Completed Order Workaround',
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                user_id: user_id,
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                context: {
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                  'GoogleAnalytics' => {
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                    clientId: data['google_analytics_client_id']
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                  },
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                  campaign: {
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                    name: data['utm_campaign'],
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                    source: data['utm_source'],
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                    medium: data['utm_medium'],
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                    term: data['utm_term'],
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                    content: data['utm_content']
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
                  },
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
                  referrer: {
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
                    url: data['referrer']
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
                  }
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
                },
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
                properties: {
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                  label: purchased_item.parent,
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                  product_skus: [purchased_item.parent],
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                  orderId: stripe_charge.id,
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                  total: (stripe_charge.amount.to_f/100.0),
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
                  revenue: revenue(stripe_charge, tax_item, discount_item),
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                  tax: ((tax_item.try(:amount) || 0)/100.0),
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
                  shipping: 0,
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                  discount: ((discount_item.try(:amount) || 0)/100.0),
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
                  discount_type: (data['premium_discount'] ? 'circulator' : nil ),
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
                  gift: data['gift'],
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
                  currency: 'USD',
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
                  products: [
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
                    {
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
                      id: purchased_item.parent,
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
                      sku: purchased_item.parent,
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
                      name: purchased_item.description,
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
                      price: (purchased_item.amount.to_f/100.0),
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
                      quantity: 1
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
                    }
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
                  ]
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
                }
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
              }
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
              if !Analytics.track(segment_data)
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.error("Error: problem tracking #{segment_data[:event]} #{segment_data}")
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
              end
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Event to Segment: #{segment_data[:event]} with data:\n#{segment_data}")
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - JPC #{user.joule_purchase_count} ")
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
              Analytics.identify(user_id: user_id, traits: {joule_purchase_count: user.joule_purchase_count})
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
              Analytics.flush()
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
          
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
              ga_common = {
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
                'v' => 1,
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
                'tid' => ENV['GA_TRACKING_ID'],
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          
          
                'cid' => data['google_analytics_client_id'],
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
                'uid' => user_id,
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
          
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
                'cu' => 'USD',
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
                'ti' => stripe_charge.id
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
              }
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
              ga_common['cn'] = data['utm_campaign'] if data['utm_campaign']
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
              ga_common['cs'] = data['utm_source'] if data['utm_source']
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
              ga_common['cm'] = data['utm_medium'] if data['utm_medium']
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
              ga_common['cc'] = data['utm_content'] if data['utm_content']
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
              ga_common['ck'] = data['utm_term'] if data['utm_term']
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
              ga_common['gclid'] = data['gclid'] if data['gclid']
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
          
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
              ga_transaction = {
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
                't' => 'transaction',
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
                'ts' => 0,
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
                'tr' => revenue(stripe_charge, tax_item, discount_item),
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
                'tt' => ((tax_item.try(:amount) || 0)/100.0),
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
              }.merge(ga_common)
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
              ga_product = {
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
                't' => 'item',
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
                'iq' => 1,
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
                'ip' => (purchased_item.amount.to_f/100.0),
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          
          
                'in' => purchased_item.description,
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
                'ic' => purchased_item.parent
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
              }.merge(ga_common)
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
          
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
              [ga_transaction, ga_product].each do |payload|
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
                validation_url = 'https://www.google-analytics.com/debug/collect'
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
                validate_result = HTTParty.post(validation_url, { body: payload })
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
                if !JSON::parse(validate_result.body)['hitParsingResult'].first['valid']
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.error("Error: invalid payload sent to GA: #{payload.inspect}")
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          
          
                else
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
                  submit_url = 'http://www.google-analytics.com/collect'
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
                  HTTParty.post(submit_url, { body: payload })
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Sending Event to GA: #{payload.inspect}")
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
                end
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
              end
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
            end
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          
          
          
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          1
          
            def revenue(stripe_charge, tax_item, discount_item)
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          
          
              charge = stripe_charge.amount
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          
          
              tax = (tax_item.try(:amount) || 0)
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
              discount = (discount_item.try(:amount) || 0)
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
              (((charge - discount) - tax)/100.0)
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
            end
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
          
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          1
          
            def create_or_update_user
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          
          
              Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - create_or_update_user")
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          
          
              customer = nil
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          
          
              if user.stripe_id.blank?
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Creating new user")
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
                begin
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
                  customer = Stripe::Customer.create(email: user.email, card: data['token'])
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          
          
                  user.stripe_id = customer.id
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
                  user.save
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          
          
                rescue Stripe::InvalidRequestError => error
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Current customer Error #{error}")
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          
          
                  if error.message.include?("You cannot use a Stripe token more than once")
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          
          
                    return customer
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          
          
                  else
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
                    raise error
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          
          
                  end
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          
          
                end
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Sent to stripe")
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          
          
              else
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Current customer updating credit card")
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          
          
                begin
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          
          
                  customer = Stripe::Customer.retrieve(user.stripe_id)
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          
          
                  customer.source = data['token']
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          
          
                  customer.save
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          
          
                rescue Stripe::InvalidRequestError => error
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Current customer Error #{error}")
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          
          
                  if error.message.include?("You cannot use a Stripe token more than once")
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          
          
                    return customer
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          
          
                  else
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          
          
                    raise error
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
                  end
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
                end
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          
          
                Rails.logger.info("Stripe Order #{id} - Customer updated")
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          
          
              end
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          
          
              return customer
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          
          
            end
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          
          
          
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          
          
          
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          1
          
            def self.build_stripe_order_data(params, circulator, premium)
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          1
          
              data = {sku: params[:sku]}
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          1
          
              data[:circulator_sale] = false
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          1
          
              data[:premium_discount] = false
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          1
          
              data[:gift] = data[:gift] = params[:gift] == 'true'
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          1
          
              data[:circulator_tax_code] = circulator[:tax_code]
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          1
          
              data[:premium_tax_code] = premium[:tax_code]
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          1
          
              data[:circulator_discount] = (circulator[:price]-circulator['premiumPrice'])
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          1
          
              data[:circulator_base_price] = circulator[:price]
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          1
          
              data[:premium_base_price] = premium[:price]
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          1
          
              data.merge!({
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          
          
                billing_name: params[:billing_name],
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          
          
                billing_address_line1: params[:billing_address_line1],
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          
          
                billing_address_city: params[:billing_address_city],
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          
          
                billing_address_state: params[:billing_address_state],
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          
          
                billing_address_zip: params[:billing_address_zip],
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          
          
                billing_address_country: params[:billing_address_country],
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          
          
                shipping_name: params[:shipping_name],
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          
          
                shipping_address_line1: params[:shipping_address_line1],
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          
          
                shipping_address_city: params[:shipping_address_city],
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          
          
                shipping_address_state: params[:shipping_address_state],
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          
          
                shipping_address_zip: params[:shipping_address_zip],
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          
          
                shipping_address_country: params[:shipping_address_country],
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          
          
                token: params['stripeToken']
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          
          
              })
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          1
          
              data
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          
          
            end
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          
          
          
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          1
          
            def self.stripe_products
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          1
          
              products = Stripe::Product.all(active: true)
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          1
          
              circulator = premium = nil
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          1
          
              products.each do |product|
        
      385. 
      
        
    385. 
          1
          
                sku = product.skus.first
        
      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          1
          
                if product.id == 'cs-premium' || product.id == 'cs10002'
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          1
          
                  premium = {sku: sku.id, title: product.name, price: sku.price, msrp: sku.metadata[:msrp].to_i, tax_code: sku.metadata[:tax_code], shippable: product.shippable}
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          
          
                elsif product.id == 'cs-joule' || product.id == 'cs10001'
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          1
          
                  circulator = {sku: sku.id, title: product.name, price: sku.price, msrp: sku.metadata[:msrp].to_i, 'premiumPrice' => sku.metadata[:premium_price].to_i, tax_code: sku.metadata[:tax_code], shippable: product.shippable}
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          
          
                end
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          
          
              end
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          1
          
              return [circulator, premium]
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          
          
            end
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          
          
          end
        
      395.

    app/models/update_whitelist_attributes.rb

    37.5 % covered

    8 relevant lines. 3 lines covered and 5 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          module UpdateWhitelistAttributes
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            extend ActiveSupport::Concern
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
            def update_whitelist_attributes(attributes)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              filtered = {}
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              return unless attributes.present?
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              attributes.each do |key, value|
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                filtered[key.to_sym] = value if self.class.accessible_attributes.include?(key.to_sym)
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              end
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              update_attributes(filtered)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            end
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          end
        
      13.

    app/models/upload.rb

          1
          
          class Upload < ActiveRecord::Base

          1

          1

          1
          
            belongs_to :activity
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
            belongs_to :user
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
            belongs_to :assembly

    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
            has_many :likes, as: :likeable, dependent: :destroy

          1
          
            has_many :events, as: :trackable, dependent: :destroy

    11. 
          1
          
            has_many :comments, as: :commentable, dependent: :destroy

    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1

      95.

            def stream
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              stream_events = []
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              followings.each do |following|

                following.events.includes(:trackable).timeline.where('action != ?', 'received_create').each do |event|
        
      121. 
      
        
    121.

      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                end
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
              end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
              stream_events.group_by{|e| [e.group_type, e.group_name]}.sort_by{|group| group[1].first.created_at}.reverse
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
            end
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
          
        
      127.

            def enrolled?(enrollable)
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
              if enrollable.nil?
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
                return false

              end
        
      162.

      163.

          2

              case

            def make_premium_member(price)
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              # Not an error b/c we do this on both main and worker, can be
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
              # racing each other.
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
              return if self.premium?
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
          
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1
          
              self.premium_member = true
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          2
          
              self.premium_membership_created_at = DateTime.now
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
              self.premium_membership_price = price
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
              # There are users that already don't pass validation so can't be resaved; not fixing right now
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
              self.save(validate: false)
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
              Resque.enqueue(UserSync, self.id)
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
            end
        
      184.

      188. 
      
        
    188.

    189.

    190.

              self.save(validate: false)

          1

          1

    197. 
          
          
            end
        
      198.

            def joule_purchased

      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1

            end

            def last_viewed_activity_in_assembly(assembly)
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
              child_ids = assembly.leaf_activities.map(&:id)
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
              last_activity = self.events.where(group_type: 'activity_show').where(trackable_id: child_ids).last
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
              if last_activity
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                last_activity.trackable

            def disconnect_service!(service)
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
              case service
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
              when "facebook"
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
                update_attributes({facebook_user_id: nil, provider: nil}, without_protection: true)
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
              when "google"
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
                update_attributes({google_user_id: nil, google_access_token: nil}, without_protection: true)
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
              when "twitter"
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
              else
        
      234. 
      
        
    234.

      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
              end
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
            end
        
      237.

            def valid_website_auth_token
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          1
          
              aa = ActorAddress.find_for_user_and_unique_key(self, 'website')
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          1
          
              if aa
        
      260. 
      
        
    260.

          1

      264.

      274. 
      
        
    274.

      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          1
          
          
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1

            def self.with_views_greater_than(view_count)
        
      284. 
      
        
    284.

            def remember_token
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
              if needs_special_terms
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          1
          
                token = SecureRandom.base64
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
              # Remaining conditional copied verbatim from rememberable.rb
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          1
          
              elsif respond_to?(:authenticatable_salt) && (salt = authenticatable_salt)
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          1
          
                token = salt
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
              else
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
                raise "authenticable_salt returned nil for the #{self.class.name} model. " \
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
                  "In order to use rememberable, you must ensure a password is always set " \
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
                  "or have a remember_token column in your model or implement your own " \
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          
          
                  "rememberable_value in the model with custom logic."
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
              end
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
          
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          1
          
              logger.info "[auth] User [#{self.id}] special terms [#{needs_special_terms}] using remember_token value #{token}"
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
              return token
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
            end
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
          
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          
          
            def generate_remember_token?
        
      308. 
      
        
    308.

      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          1
          
              return false
        
      310.

            end
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
          
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
            # instead of deleting, indicate the user requested a delete & timestamp it
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
            def soft_delete
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
              logger.info "Setting User #{id} as soft deleted at #{Time.current}"
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          
          
              update_attribute(:deleted_at, Time.current)
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          
          
            end
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          
          
          
        
      318. 
      
        
    318.

      319.

              logger.info "Setting User #{id} as undeleted at #{Time.current}"
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
              update_attribute(:deleted_at, nil)
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
            end
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          
          
          
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
            # ensure user account is active
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          
          
            def active_for_authentication?
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          1
          
              super && !deleted_at
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          
          
            end
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          
          
          
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          
          
            # provide a custom message for a deleted account
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
            def inactive_message
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          
          
              !deleted_at ? super : "Your account has been deleted."
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          
          
            end

          end

            def assign_from_facebook(auth)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              attrs = {
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                provider: auth.provider,
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                facebook_user_id: auth.uid,
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                name: self.name.blank? ? auth.extra.raw_info.name : self.name
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              }
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              update_password = !(persisted? || self.password.present?)

    11. 
          
          
              attrs.merge!({password: Devise.friendly_token[0,20]}) if update_password
        
      12.

              assign_attributes(attrs, without_protection: true)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              self
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            end

              def facebook_connect(user)

              def facebook_connected_user(auth)

              def connected_user(auth)

              def connect_via_email(auth)
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                user = User.where(email: auth.info.email).first
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                return if user.nil?
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                user.assign_from_facebook(auth)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              end
        
      50.

            end

          require 'nokogiri'

          module User::Google

            def find_google_contact_friends(google_app_id, google_secret)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              return nil unless connected_with_google?
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              gather_contacts(google_app_id, google_secret) do |contacts|
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                current_users = User.where(email: contacts.map{|c| c[:email]})
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                return current_users
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              end
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
            end
        
      20.

    21. 
          1
          
            def gather_google_contacts(google_app_id, google_secret)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              return nil unless connected_with_google?
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              gather_contacts(google_app_id, google_secret) do |contacts|
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                current_users = User.where(email: contacts.map{|c| c[:email]}).pluck(:email)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                contacts = contacts.reject{|c| current_users.include?(c[:email])}
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                return contacts.sort{|a,b| a[:name].downcase <=> b[:name].downcase}
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
            end
        
      29.

          1
          
            def google_connect(user_options)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
              self.update_attributes({google_user_id: user_options[:google_user_id], google_refresh_token: user_options[:google_refresh_token], google_access_token: user_options[:google_access_token]}, without_protection: true)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
            end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
            def gather_contacts(google_app_id, google_secret, &block)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              authorization = self.class.create_authorization(google_app_id, google_secret)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              authorization.update_token!(refresh_token: google_refresh_token, access_token: google_access_token)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              begin
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                groups_request = authorization.fetch_protected_resource(uri: "https://www.google.com/m8/feeds/groups/default/full/6?v=3.0")
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                group = Nokogiri::XML(groups_request.body).css("id").text
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                contacts_request = authorization.fetch_protected_resource(uri: "https://www.google.com/m8/feeds/contacts/default/full/?max-results=100000&v=3.0&group=#{group}")
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                xml = Nokogiri::XML(contacts_request.body)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                contacts = []
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                entries = xml.search("entry")
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                entries.each do |entry|
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                  contact = {email: nil, name: nil}
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  contact[:name] = entry.xpath(entry.path + "//gd:fullName").text
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  contact[:email] = entry.xpath(entry.path + "//gd:email[@primary='true']/@address").text
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                  contact[:email] = entry.at_xpath(entry.path + "//gd:email/@address").try(:text) if contact[:email].blank?
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  contacts << contact if contact[:email].present?
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                block.call(contacts)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              rescue Signet::AuthorizationError
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                new_token = authorization.fetch_access_token!
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                update_attribute(:google_access_token, new_token["access_token"])
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                retry
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
            end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
            module ClassMethods
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
              def google_connect(user_options)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
                User.where("users.email = :email OR users.google_user_id = :google_user_id", user_options).
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                  first_or_initialize(user_options.merge(password: Devise.friendly_token[0,20]), without_protection: true)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              # This is some magic shit, here are some links that helped me
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              # https://developers.google.com/+/web/signin/server-side-flow
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              # https://github.com/google/google-api-ruby-client
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              # https://github.com/google/google-api-ruby-client-samples
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
              def gather_info_from_google(params, google_app_id, google_secret)
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
                client = Google::APIClient.new(:application_name => 'Chefsteps', :application_version => 'beta', auto_refresh_token: true)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
                info = client.discovered_api('oauth2', 'v2')
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
                google_params = params[:google]
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
                authorization = create_authorization(google_app_id, google_secret)
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                authorization.code = google_params[:code]
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
                authorization.fetch_access_token!
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
                results = client.execute( :api_method => info.userinfo.get, :authorization => authorization )
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                email = results.data.email
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
                name = results.data.name
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
                google_user_id = results.data.id
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
                google_refresh_token = authorization.refresh_token
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          1
          
                google_access_token = authorization.access_token
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                return {email: email, name: name, google_user_id: google_user_id, google_refresh_token: google_refresh_token, google_access_token: google_access_token}
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
              end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
              def create_authorization(google_app_id, google_secret)
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
                data = File.open(Rails.root.join("config", "client_secrets.json")) { |file| MultiJson.load(file.read) }
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
                data["web"].merge!("redirect_uris" => ["postmessage"], "client_secret" => google_secret, "client_id" => google_app_id)
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
                client_secrets = Google::APIClient::ClientSecrets.new(data)
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                authorization = client_secrets.to_authorization
        
      90. 
      
        
    90.

            def time_scope
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              results = UserActivity.where("user_id = ? AND activity_id = ? AND created_at BETWEEN ? AND ?", self.user_id, self.activity_id, Time.now - 1.minute, Time.now).all
        
      13.
